ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games! They are a dynamic and experienced team in London and Budapest who have set theirselves the goal to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding reach and distribution. They went public on Nasdaq in Stockholm in 2018 and since then they have been picked by Prolific London to be in the top 5 most valuable London based gaming startup.
At the core of their business is their patented technology that makes it possible to add, modify or remove features in compiled games to make them compatible with the requirements of any store without source code change. The technology does not require game developers to do any redevelopment work and does not require access to the game’s source code. It can enhance existing applications by adding features and functionality, such as gifting, in-app billing and several other solutions, primarily to drive revenue and user engagement.
As a Java Developer at our partner you will be part of thier highly efficient and collaborative Agile teams where you will be designing, building and maintaining features that replace some of their existing functionalities with state of the art technologies and add new business features. As part of the role you will have the opportunity to deep dive into the core of the Android platform and their billing services.
Key Activities:
Design and build the next iteration of the state of the art their software;Cooperate with other cross-functional teams to define and design platform improvement components and core features of their platform;Work with external data sources and APIs provided by companies like PayPal, Samsung and Amazon;Test your code (unit test, feature test) for robustness, including edge cases, usability, performance and reliability;Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request to the platform
                Elvárások / Requirements
Technical skills:
2+ years experience as a Java Developer;Core Java and unit testing knowledge;Agile experience;Good SQL knowledge, preferably MySQL;A good understanding of HTTP protocol;Few years of work experience in related areas
Soft Skills:
Passion for technology, preferably within mobile space;Critical mindset and strong problem-solving ability;Enthusiastic and optimistic mindset;Strong ability and willingness to learn;Good communication skills, both verbal and written;Good interpersonal and team work skills;A passion for delivering high quality solutions
Education:
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Eligibility for share option packageCompany mobile phoneTrainingsCompany eventsCompetitive salary
Java Developer

IT officer 
Szeretnél egy nemzetközi csapat részese lennél? Fontos számodra a fenntartható fejlesztés és a bolygónk?
Akkor a legjobb helyen jársz!
Jelentkezz partnerünkhöz, akik kulcsfontosságú technológiákat kínál, amelyek segítenek a tisztább bolygó megteremtésében.
Most Rendszergazdát keresünk partnerünkhöz, hogy a fenntartható jövő ne csak egy álom legyen.
Ha szeretnél részese lenni ennek a missziónak jelentkezz még MA!
 Feladatok
 A vállalat hálózati infrastruktúrájának level 1-2 szintű támogatása, valamint hatékony végfelhasználói támogatás az alkalmazásokban és hardverekben
 Műszaki tanácsadóként tevékenykedik minden számítógéppel kapcsolatos kérdésben és irányítja az informatikai megoldások megvalósítását
 Vészhelyzeti támogatást nyújt, ahol ez lehetséges, részlegi erőforrások vagy harmadik fél által biztosított erőforrások felhasználásával
 A rendszertervezés, -szervezés és a releváns informatikai rendszerek fejlesztésének koordinálása
 Az összes számítógép-vásárlás ellenőrzése és monitorozása, biztosítva a kompatibilitást a meglévő rendszerekkel a költségvetési korlátoknak megfelelően 
 Hatékony kommunikáció és kapcsolattartás az összes részleggel informatikai kérdésekben és kapcsolattartás harmadik felekkel és törvényes szervekkel 
 Koordinálja és segíti a végfelhasználók képzési és fejlesztési követelményeit
 Biztosítsa a rendszer- és adatbiztonságot megfelelő biztosítékok és eljárások bevezetésével, fenntartásával és felülvizsgálatával
 Biztosítsa, hogy az informatikai eszközök használata betartja al l vonatkozó szabványok és jogi követelmények
 Az oldal informatikai projektjeivel kapcsolatos munka más oldalakon folyó projektekhez is segítséget nyújt

Munkavégzés ideje: 8:30 - 16:30

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ha van tapasztalatod IT üzemeltetésben, úgy érzed megállnád a helyed a kritikus rendszerek működtetésében, profin koordinálnád azokat, és biztos támogatója lennél a partnercégünk infrastruktúrájának, akkor jelentkezz Rendszeradminisztrátori pozíciónkba.
Partnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatukba keresünk új kollégát. 
Feladatok:
Partnercégünk IT osztályának kezelésében lévő adathálózat és kommunikációs infrastruktúra 2. szintű, és bizonyos esetekben 3. szintű támogatási szolgáltatásának biztosítása.
Az ISO20000 alapú „Problem Management” és „Change Management” folyamataival összhangban a problémákhoz és a karbantartásokhoz, rendszer változásokhoz tartozó esetek és jegyek kezelése és dokumentálása.
Szakmai kapcsolattartás az informatikai beszállítókkal és a 3. szintű támogatói csoportokkal. Kapcsolattartás a kulcsfelhasználókkal.
Rendszer tesztelések – infrastruktúra és felhasználói -, leszervezése, támogatása és dokumentálása.
                Elvárások / Requirements
Elvárások:
Rendelkezz középfokú végzettséggel informatikai vagy villamosmérnök területen
Minimum 1 év releváns üzemeltetési tapasztalat
Alapszintű MS Windows és Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek
Középfokon tudj kommunikálni angolul szóban és írásban
“B” kategóriás jogosítványodat gyakorlatban is tudd használni
Nyitottan állj egy-egy új helyzet megoldásához, ügyesen szervezz folyamatokat
Kommunikálj hatékonyan és barátságosan
Légy önálló, és talpraesett, de ha szükséges, merj támaszkodni a csapatra
Előnyök:
Felsőfokú végzettség informatikai vagy villamosmérnök területen

haladó szintű Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek

kritikus, 7x24 órás rendszerek üzemeltetési tapasztalat

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Business Service Center is a German family-owned automotive company, and they would like to represent themselves also in the Hungarian market. They are planning to hire 350 new employees, and they will have a brand new office in Budapest. New colleagues will have a chance to join a new company and to make decisions on professional topics. These employees who add their own ideas would be prioritized by the management of the company. Fluent English is necessary to use for everyday work.
As an IT specialist various enhancements and optimizations will be customized in SAP WM/M to support our logistics departments in their daily work. The main focus of this position is the interface to our automatic warehouses and the setup and optimization of these processes as well.
Main tasks, roles, and responsibilities:
Detailing the solution design in close cooperation with our logistics solution architects
Customizing in SAP to fulfill business requirements
Contact to the business for automatic warehouses
Steering of external consultants
Creation of programming requests for our internal development team or for external programmers
Testing
Special Tasks/Key challenges:
Support of processes in the area of automatic warehouses and the interface to SAP ERP
Participation in the S/4 rollout
                Elvárások / Requirements
University degree with a focus on IT or similar qualification/training
3 or more years of experience
Experienced working in an international, virtual team
Deep SAP knowledge in the area of SAP-WM/IM and in the surrounding SAP modules
Knowledge about automatic warehouses and interface technology via IDOCs
Good English skills (spoken and written)

Dynamic atmosphere

Pozíció leírása / Job description
As an internationally positioned IT team, we support the Client's product development by providing applications and solutions for mechanical and software development and for the management of development data. In this processes, we count more than 6,000 users among our internal customers.
We operate in a very heterogeneous environment of applications, such as CATIA Mechanical Design, MS Project Server, JIRA, GIT Software Management, Doors NG Requirements Management and our PLM system CIM Database.
To strengthen our team we are looking for a qualified and motivated IT specialist at our location in Budapest.
We offer an exciting work environment in a globally operating enterprise with many various opportunities for your own personal professional growth.
Focus is the software technical implementation of requirements demanded by our business partners in the engineering departments, mainly in Python programming language and in the context of our PLM System CIM Database
Developments of add-ons and interfaces to automate and optimize business processes.
Configuration of the engineering applications according to the business needs.
Operation, installation, configuration and incident handling in the environment of engineering applications.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our international client is looking for an experienced test automation engineer for their team based in Budapest. By joining the team, you'll be involved in the development and testing of one of their products, which optimizes the daily utilization of flights, increases user productivity and improves airline management when there are deviations from the regular schedule.
Our new test engineer's focus will be:
Participating in implementation projects in a cross-functional team
Implementing test scenarios from component level to system tests including non-functional ones
Proactively improving the QA strategy
Engaging in all of the steps of the development lifecycle as a tester
Validating requirement / user stories from testing perspective
                Elvárások / Requirements
The requirements you should fulfill:
At least 3 years of experience in software development or test automation
Experience in Java and/or C#
Active English and Hungarian language skills (spoken and written)
Experience in CI/CD
Extensive knowledge of automation tools and software testing processes

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Are you passionate about software and about aviation? Do you love a technical challenge and like to work on multiple platforms to create a consistent experience for the consumers?
Our partner company has 30.000 employees worldwide. The company has a head office in Paris and Amsterdam and has several daughter companies. The group has over 550 aircraft and they are one of the bigger players in Europe. The developers they are hiring now will be working from Budapest, but fully part of the product teams.
The company has gone through a major restructuring over the last two years to adjust to the covid crisis. They are now implementing a strategic restructuring program in which one of the pillars is the Data & Technology track. They have expressed the ambition to become the most data and tech-driven accompany in their sector. To do this, they are innovating and expanding and thus looking to attract more experts to the company.
Specify, design, engineer, test, deliver, deploy, maintain and support digital products in order to optimally enable the improvement of business processes.
As a software developer, you now have the opportunity to join a new team in our partner company. However, there is already a team of developers working on the airline's internal applications in Amsterdam they are looking to involve those who join the new team in the development of new applications.
Our partner company is looking for an agile & objective-minded experienced developer with a pro-active mindset that is eager to learn new things.

 1992-ben alakult építőipari családi vállalkozás megbízásából Budapest és Pest megyei munkáikhoz keresünk fiatal, agilis munkatársat az alábbi pozícióba:
ÉPÍTÉSVEZETŐ ÚT-, KÖZMŰÉPÍTŐ
Az álláshoz tartozó elvárások:
Legalább középfokú szakirányú végzettség
Min. B kategóriás jogosítvány szükséges.
Min. 3 éves szakmai tapasztalat mélyépítés területén (önéletrajzodban tüntesd fel)
Magabiztos felhasználói szintű számítógépes ismeretek (MS Office, AutoCad stb.)
Tervrajzok olvasása, tervellenőrzés, minimális szerkesztések AutoCadben
Önálló munkavégzésre való képesség
Az állás betöltéséhez előnyt jelent:
Felsőfokú végzettség
Többlettapasztalat
Főbb feladatok, munkák:
Irányítja a projektekhez beosztott fizikai állomány és a saját brigádok munkáját

Kapcsolatot tart a brigádvezetőkkel, alvállalkozók helyszíni irányítóival
Együttműködik a projektvezetővel, az építkezés vezetőivel, és az egyéb szakági vezetőkkel
Koordinálja és ellenőrzi az alvállalkozók munkáját, a teljesítésekben szereplő mennyiségeket ellenőrzi
Naprakész adminisztráció: építési napló vezetése, projektek dokumentálása igény esetén
A munkaterületre kirendelt erőforrások és anyagok hatékony előkészítése, működtetése, felhasználásának ellenőrzése
Kapcsolattartás a megrendelőkkel
Kapcsolatot tart a megrendelő képviselőjével és a műszaki ellenőrökkel
Kapcsolatot tart a beszállítókkal, a logisztikával, előkészíti az anyagrendeléseket, részt vesz a műszaki egyeztetésekben
Kiemelt figyelmet fordít a műszaki, minőségi és munkabiztonsági előírások betartására

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Adatvédelmi Szakértő 
A bankszektorban biztos szereplőként komplex pénzügyi szolgáltatásokat nyújtunk, országosan több mint 700 bankfiókkal és digitális felületekkel állunk ügyfeleink rendelkezésére. A stabilitás nálunk a mindennapi munkában a megbízható, egymásra építeni tudó kollegiális kapcsolatokban is megmutatkozik. Nagymértékben támogatjuk munkatársaink fejlődését: változatos feladatokkal, több szervezeti egységet is érintő projektekkel, állandó képzésekkel.
Egymást segítve közösen oldjuk meg a feladatokat, mert nálunk hagyomány, hogy „Kell egy csapat”! A jövőnk Benned van!
Adatvédelmi Szakértő
ÍGY TÁMOGATUNK:
Fix alapbér és versenyképes juttatási csomag 
Utazási költségek részleges megtérítése
Folyamatos belső szakmai képzések, tréningek
Kedvezményes sportolási lehetőségek, sport csapatok
Mentor Programunk, Mentorok segítik a beilleszkedést
Takarék Coaching Program segíthet az önfejlesztésben
Közösségépítő és online események (Takarék Olimpia, Dolgozói Nap, Karácsony, Véradás stb.)        
Kutyabarát Munkahely
FELADATOK:
A szervezeten belülről érkező, adatvédelmi tárgyú kérdések megválaszolása
Digitalizációs és egyéb projektek adatvédelmi támogatása
Belső egyeztetéseken való részvétel, ennek keretében az adatvédelmi osztály álláspontjának képviselete

ELVÁRÁSOK:

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Site Cybersecurity Officer - Veszprém 
Munkavégzés helye: 
Veszprém
            Pozíció területei: 
IT: IT állások
RESPONSIBILITIES:
Coordinate the different actors of the site for all Cybersecurity topics
Raise any non-compliance, abnormal Cybersecurity event, and Cybersecurity incident
Manage locally the Cybersecurity events and incidents
Provide the reporting of the site to the Regional Cybersecurity Officer
Contribute to develop the Cybersecurity mindset within the site
Control that the Group Cybersecurity standards, rules and best practices
Manage and provide the Cybersecurity KPIs of the site
Analyze and consult all IT-Security matters to the management and the users within the site as main contact person.
Planning and Performing of IT Security Audits, in cooperation with internal and external service providers
Planning and Execution of IT-Security Projects as Project Manager and Expert in cooperation with the Site IS Manager
Installation and development of IT security tools and standards
Verification of the Business Continuity Process, Review and Update Process
REQUIREMENTS:
Graduate in Computer Science
3 years experience in Cybersecurity
Result orientation attitude
Knowledge of English
Information Technology competences
Analytical skills
Problem-solving skills
IT Security background and knowledge
Knowledge in security standards (e.g. BSI, NIST, ISO 27001, TISAX), as well as data protection
ADVANTAGE:
French/ German knowledge
Security certificates (e.g. Security+, CEH, CISSP or similar)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
BUDAPESTI KÖZLEKEDÉSI ZÁRTKÖRŰEN MŰKÖDŐ RÉSZVÉNYTÁRSASÁG
IT kontroller
munkakörbe munkatársat keres
A BKV Zrt. egy nagy múlttal rendelkező, stabil nagyvállalat. Informatikai Főosztálya dinamikusan változó és a piaci igényeknek megfelelő infrastruktúrával, technológiával rendelkezik. Folyamatosan bővülő csapatunkba keresünk informatikai kontrolleri feladatok ellátására kollégát.  
Ha fontos számodra a stabil, biztos háttér, a kiszámítható munkakörnyezet, a vidám és támogató munkahelyi légkör, ugyanakkor nyitott vagy a technikai, technológiai újdonságokra, jelentkezz csapatunkba!
Főbb feladatok:
Informatikai rendszerek támogatása a belső üzleti területek igényeinek elemzésével, tervezésével és dokumentálásával.
Az informatikai beruházások és informatikai üzemi költségek tervezése, nyomon követése (eszközök, licencek, szakértői díjak, fejlesztések, üzemeltetési és karbantartási költségek, oktatási díjak).
Az informatika kontrolling feladatainak ellátása az SAP CO modulban.
Üzleti igényekhez kapcsolódóan üzleti esettanulmány és gazdaságossági számítások készítése.
Fejlesztési dokumentumok véleményezése.
A társaság informatikai rendszereinek és rendszerkapcsolatainak tervezésével összefüggő feladatok ellátása.
Informatikai beszerzési igények szakmai tartalmának előkészítése, támogatása.
Versenyeztetési anyagok és tender anyagok előkészítése, szerkesztése, véleményezése, versenyeztetés lefolytatásában való közreműködés.
Szállítói számlák, szerződések, teljesítés igazolások jóváhagyási, kontrolling feladatainak ellátása, koordinációja.
Egyedi kalkulációk és operatív gazdasági elemzési feladatok elvégzése a költség-felhasználás hatékonyságának növelése a vezetői döntéstámogatás érdekében.
a területéhez tartozó fejlesztési és beruházási igények koordinációjában való közreműködés.
Működési és hatékonyságjavító projektek irányítása, döntés-előkészítő tevékenység folyamatos ellátása.
Feladataival összefüggő adatszolgáltatási, véleményezési feladatok ellátása, döntés előkészítő javaslatok készítése.
A munkakörének ellátásával összefüggő adminisztratív és nyilvántartási feladatok teljes körű elvégzése, dokumentumok előírás szerinti kezelése.
Követelmények:
informatikai vagy gazdasági területen szerzett felsőfokú végzettség
legalább 3 év munkatapasztalat
Elvárt tulajdonságok:
nagyvállalati gondolkodásmód
kommunikációs készség
határozott, meggyőző fellépés
precíz, pontos munkavégzés
jó problémamegoldó készség
diplomatikus hozzáállás
jó fogalmazókészség
Amit kínálunk:
versenyképes juttatási csomag

A CRITERION Biztonsági Szolgáltatások Zrt. A CRITERION CSOPORT RÉSZEKÉNT KERES:

munkatársat
(Szarajevóban)
A CRITERION Biztonságtechnikai Zrt. a biztonságtechnika területén szerzett több mint 30 éves szakmai tapasztalat birtokában teljes körű, és piacvezető biztonsági megoldásokat kínál. Ha szeretnél része lenni egy folyamatos szakmai kihívásokat nyújtó, nemzetközi projektben is részt vevő csapatnak, jelentkezz hozzánk!
Feladatok:
Ügyfél telephelyén (Szarajevóban) működő saját gyártású biztonságtechnikai rendszerek (beléptető és kártyagyártó rendszer) üzemeltetése, eseti javítása
Tervezett megelőző karbantartási feladatok elvégzése mind szoftver, mind hardver tekintetében
A rendszer bővítése esetén új elemek/funkciók tesztelése, illetve telepítése
Ügyfél részére rendszertámogatás biztosítása készenléti rendszerben angol nyelven a kollégákkal váltásban.
Kezelői kézikönyvek, oktatási segédletek, bemutató anyagok készítése, oktatások tartása a kezelő személyzet részére angol nyelven
Elvárások:
Hosszútávú, tartós külföldi (Szarajevó) tartózkodás vállalása
Magabiztos, folyékony angol nyelvtudás írásban és szóban
Minimum technikusi végzettség (elektronika, IT vagy telekommunikáció területéről)
Minimum 3 éves tapasztalat IT vagy biztonságtechnikai rendszerek üzemeltetése területén
TCP/IP hálózatok alap szintű ismerete
B kategóriás jogosítvány
Alkalmasság az NBF személyi biztonsági tanúsítványának megszerzésére
Előnyök:
BSC/MSC végzettség (biztonságtechnikai mérnök/informatika/villamosmérnök)
NBF személyi biztonsági tanúsítvány megléte

Vagyonvédelmi rendszerszerelő szakképesítés

Production IT Support
munkatársat keresünk mátészalkai székhelyünkre az alábbi feltételekkel
Tasks:
Assure day to day operations of all applications within the shop-floor
Coordination of system releases with corporate group.
Configure the standardized software solutions to follow the local production needs
System monitoring (Server, Docker® Microservices, etc.)  including interfaces.
Incident management for shop-floor systems. Troubleshoot, coordinate with involved groups, communicate, and provide direction to end user.
Maintaining and monitoring backups of production dependent software/systems.
Training of end-users on Manufacturing Execution System (MES) functionality
Maintain master data and support equipment implementation as well as new product implementation.
Assists in the development and implementation of Carl Zeiss Vision Network goals, objectives, policies, and priorities; conducts research, analyzes data, and makes recommendations regarding administrative, organizational, and operational issues.
Requirements: 
Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems, industrial engineering, computer science or equivalent experience to substitute for degree.
Minimum 2-year experience in helpdesk support and support from MS windows servers and desktop preferred in manufacturing environment.
Recent experience with SQL Servers, SQL queries, MongoDB or other equivalent database technology General knowledge of relational databases
Experience working and administering both a Windows and Linux server environment is a plus.
Experience with Java Server Faces (JSF) or other areas of Java development is a plus.
Experience in client/server applications with applications servers preferred Wildfly or JBoss
Experience with shop-floor systems and connecting applications to machine interfaces (Serial RS232, TCP connection) is a plus
Fluent in English on a business level
We offer: 
Competitive salary system
Fringe benefits (Cafeteria)
Personal and professional development
Dynamic and youthful team in multinational environment

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client is an international company in the automotive industry who are looking for a software development engineer who supports the integrate of safety technologies and controls vehicle dynamics to ensure safe and comfortable driving. The objective is to implement "Vision Zero", the vision of accident-free driving. Autonomous Mobility and Safety's components and system capabilities are prerequisites for autonomous mobility.
Using the engineering viewset in the daily work
Utilizes internal development processes and connected tools in line with the regulation autonomously
Checks and fulfills tasks according to project schedules
Keeps his/her knowledge of the special professional field and of the related regulations up-to-date
Cooperates with the related departments and the development departments of car manufacturers
                Elvárások / Requirements

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Technical Support Engineer - Junior Java Developer 
Your new company 
Our partner is a uniquely profitable B2B enterprise software company with 1,100 fiery-eyed employees all across Europe, the Americas, Middle East, and Asia. As the leading provider of enterprise open source technologies, our partner has been recognized by Gartner for empowering businesses around the world to solve complex digital challenge. But they don’t just make awesome software, they are also fueled by a greater-than-profit vision. By building a vibrant business, making technology useful, and investing in communities, our partner make it possible for people to reach their full potential to serve others. Our partner gives their employees five extra days off to volunteer at charities they’re excited about, and our partner donates a portion of their profits to charities around the world. „Oh, we’re also self-funded which gives us the freedom to work on whatever we think brings the most value to customers and communities in the long run!”
Your new role 
Do you enjoy finding smart solutions to resolve complex technical issues on the code level? Are you interested in improving products and robust systems that cover real business needs? Do you want to get familiar with various software technologies without the pressure of project deadlines or solution delivery dates? If your answer is yes you are at the right place.
Resolve technical issues
Take the opportunity to improve our Products’ quality
Our partner main objective is to help their subscribers to achieve meaningful goals
Work in a team of highly skilled and talented software engineers
What you'll need to succeed 
At least 1 year of experience coding in Java
At least an intermediate level of English knowledge
Problem-solving mindset
Eagerness to learn new skills and willingness to share it with others
What you'll get in return 
Health Care package
work social activities.
Working environment is very enjoyable, spacious and bright with excellent faculties.
Large cooking and entertaining areas, gaming rooms, team building environments and a healthy balance of competition/social networking. 
„We place the highest priority on the growth and success of our colleagues, with a flexible approach to reach a work style that includes 60% daily work, 20% helping each other and 20% learning time with near zero administration.”
Supports remote work
Our partner has won the "Best Employer" prize in 2020 by Kincentric!
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
    If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Lead Software Engineer 
The Company
Diligent is the pioneer in modern governance. We empower leaders to turn governance into a competitive advantage through unparalleled insight and highly secure, integrated SaaS applications, helping organizations thrive and endure in today’s complex, global landscape. The largest global network of corporate directors and executives, Diligent is relied on by more than 19,000 organizations and nearly 700,000 leaders in over 90 countries. With award-winning customer service, Diligent serves more than 50% of the Fortune 1000, 70% of the FTSE 100, and 65% of the ASX. Our passionate, smart, and creative group of more than 1,000 employees support customers around the globe.
Position Overview
Boards Director is one Diligent’s most high profile applications, providing boards and executives with modern governance tools that allows the board to expand their reach outside the boardroom as well as meeting requirements such as distribution of board meeting materials in a secure environment.
Diligent are looking for a Lead Software Engineers to join our Center for Global Product Innovation in Budapest. In this role, you will be responsible for leading, inspiring, mentoring and coaching one or more agile delivery teams to ensure regular successful delivery of world-class software solutions and deliver on Diligent’s ambition to redefine the way organizations are governed.
Key Responsibilities
Drive a culture of creativity, collaboration, speed, innovation and excellence, whilst actively promote Diligent values
Passionately but pragmatically drive Agile and DevOps principles and practices
Provide technical leadership within a highly collaborative technology environment
Collaborate with senior engineering managers to define technical strategy and architecture
Drive technical excellence and quality. Be the person your team look up to for technical guidance
Co-ordinate and drive communication and collaboration between Engineering, QA, Operations, and other technology groups, to ensure regular smooth delivery of working software to production
Participate in the hiring process through CV Reviews, Code Reviews, Phone Screens, and Technical interviews
Ensure that the onboarding experience of new hires and transfers into the team is valuable and repeatable
This is a hands-on role, and this person will spend around half their time contributing as a hands-on software engineer. This will include:
Collaborating with product and UX leaders in the analysis and documentation of technical requirements and user stories for assigned features, in accordance with the agile methodology employed by Diligent
Designing, coding, reviewing, and testing assigned features and user stories, in accordance with the agile methodology employed by Diligent. We expect a Technical Lead to lead by example in every area, none more so than in the hands-on development of our products
Contributing to the quality assurance/testing strategy for assigned features, and performing technical tasks as required to support that strategy, including but not limited to development of unit and other automated tests, and assisting with acceptance and regression testing
Required Experience/Skills:
Angular 2+ (with 7/8 preferred), JavaScript, Typescript (Experience in other modern web frameworks such as React/Vue/Ember/Svelte) may be an acceptable substitute)
.NET/.NET core (Java may be an acceptable substitute)
Experience with common patterns in distributed systems (REST, SOA)
Familiarity with DevOps practices, including containerization, test automation, build servers, performance monitoring, static analysis. Specific experience in GIT, Jenkins, Grafana would be beneficial
Strong experience in agile/lean methodologies and processes
Demonstrated ability to lead and/or guide a team
Leading the formation of solution designs
Excellent communication skills both written and oral
Preferred Experience/Skills:
Microsite/micro front-end architecture

Our Partner offers a great work environment, challenging career opportunities, professional training and competitive compensation. Looking for a challenge where your experience is valued? Come see what you can achieve as a leader with our Partner!

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
German/French speaking Application Support Analyst 
Our partner is a global supplier of intelligent automation software. The company's software allows businesses to automate and improve business workflows by simplifying the handling of data and documents.
The small-sized Application Support team which operates in Hungary are really working together closely, hence we are seeking a person who fancies the idea of working in a small multinational environment.
The Application Support Analyst is responsible for providing 1st level technical support to end customers who purchased the company’s desktop products, and resolving reported issues in an effective and timely manner.  In addition, the position requires frequent interaction with Subject Matter Experts and Sr. Technical Support Engineers to properly document and escalation of undocumented issues.
Your main responsibilities are:
Greet customers in a courteous, friendly and professional manner using agreed upon procedures.
Provide 1st level technical support to our customers via phone, web, and email and other support channels as required.
Take ownership of customer issues, provide prompt and accurate feedback to customers and see problems through to resolution.
Effectively communicate complex technical issues to customers and elevate unknown or undocumented issues to Subject Matter Experts and Senior Technical Support Engineers, providing detail description of problems along with steps taken to analyze the problems
You are the ideal candidate if you:
have fluent French or German language skills (both written and verbal)
have strong English language skills (written and verbal)
have minimum 1- 2 years customer support experience
are resourceful team player with strong interpersonal skills
are result-oriented with strong problem-solving skills
Good knowledge of Windows/MAC OS with the ability to carry out root cause analysis
Working knowledge of Microsoft Office products, local and hosted
Ability to troubleshoot and configure peripheral devices - (Printers, Scanners, iPad, Smart Phones)
Maintain technical knowledge to keep up with changes in technology
Flexible work schedule with focus on EMEA business hours
What our client offers:
Good team spirit in a small multinational environment
Competitive salary package
Modern office environment in the 13th district, near to M3 metro station
Regular home office opportunity
There are no various shifts, service hours are between 9 am – 6 pm CET.
What you need to do now:

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Python fejlesztő 
﻿Python fejlesztő
Vállalatirányítási rendszerek egyedi fejlesztésével, implementálásával foglalkozó cégünkhöz keresünk Python fejlesztőnket/programozónkat! Egyedi, általunk cégekre szabott rendszerekkel dolgozunk! Előfordul remote, de az irodában is jellemző a munkavégzés (Budapest, 14. kerület).
Főbb feladatok:
·        a már meglévő vállalatirányítási rendszerek testreszabása, ügyfél-igényekre szabása
·        új modulok fejlesztése
Szükséges képességek:
·        minimum 2-3 év releváns szakmai tapasztalat (Python)
·        angol nyelvtudás
·        nyitottság új technológiák megismerésére
Óriási előny, ha van tapasztalatod:
·        nagyvállalati rendszerekben
·        vállalatirányítási rendszerekben
Mit ajánlunk?
·        versenyképes fizetést
·        pörgős, segítőkész csapatot, ahol fejlődni tudsz
·        esetenként távmunkát
Ha több információt szeretnél tudni, vagy jelentkeznél hozzánk azt az alábbi email címen teheted meg: allas@megbizhatomunkatarsak.hu
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our global Client is looking for their new Java Developer colleague who can take part in designing common modules for various products which provide optimal support for airlines! 
By joining one of their teams you will have a possibility to use a wide range of Java technologies and to work together with German and Hungarian teams.
You will be responsible for:
Designing, implementing and testing new functionalitiesMaintain the current systemKeeping contact and cooperating with teams located in Hungary and in Germany, ensure smooth and active communication with co-workers and associated partners
You will deal with the following technologies, tools and frameworks:
Java Spring framework (Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security, Spring Integration, Spring Cloud)RESTful servicesMicroservicesOracle, PostgreSQL, SQLHibernateMaven, GitJira, ConfluenceDocker
                Elvárások / Requirements
You will be successful if you have:
Practical experience in design and development in Java applications (at least 3 years)Good Object Oriented Programming and Design skillsGood knowledge of English both spoken and writtenStrong analytical and problem solving skillsHave professional experience in working with the technology stackLike working on projects with high responsibilityHave solution-focused approach
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What are the benefits of joining Our Partner as an employee?
Even when you work hard, you will still have time for your personal life: their flexible working hours based on core time, the exact observance of the designated number of working hours and the benefits that can be extended to cover your family you can also improve your non-working life!
They have long-term plans for you! They have carefully designed career paths (and a career management system), they provide the appropriate training courses and projects to accomplish your aims.
Their community is characterized by mutual respect and an attitude of helpfulness. This high professional quality level and the colorful personalities will help you spend your everyday life in a good mood, why you make the best of your skills and talents.
In addition to an inclusive and helpful atmosphere, trust is also an important value for the company. You can rely on Our Partner with anything right from your first day.
Java Developer

 Relationship Manager - Corporate Sector

 Fúrós 
 Nyírbátor  
 diagnosztikai rendszertervező mérnök 
 Budapest  
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. 
You’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend their AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of their platform and participate in their journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of infrastructure Ops, DevOps, and full-stack Software Engineering.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
                Elvárások / Requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in Ops/DevOps or software development
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
Skills that drive success in this role:
Unix/Linux/Bash, setting up and managing virtual servers. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what we do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
Clean coding skills. We are always expanding the areas where we apply the “infrastructure as code” approach. We write new code and we carefully review the code of our colleagues, ranging from small infrastructure automation scripts, continuous integration support, to more complex backend code.
Kubernetes, Helm. We continue migrating more of our services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
SQL, MySQL. We manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. We use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. We aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and we rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but we don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role:
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
JUnit/TestNG
GitOps, CDK, EKS, Flux
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
A wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement
DevOps Engineer in Platform Engineering 
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. 
You’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend our AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of our platform and participate in our journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of backend Software Engineering and infrastructure Ops/DevOps.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the Flexion platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
                Elvárások / Requirements
Skills that drive success in this role
Java, clean coding skills. Some of our most impactful changes are done on the software backend side of the services that we run and we use Java even for the automation of our platform itself.
Spring Boot. We provide standardised service setup to other dev teams and this industry standard framework is an integral part of it.
Unix/Linux/Bash. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what they do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
SQL, MySQL. They manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Kubernetes, Helm. They continue migrating more of their services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. They use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. They aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and they rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but they don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role
JUnit/TestNG
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, Git
GitOps (Flux)
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
Further requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in software development or Ops/DevOps
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
A wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement
Java Software Engineer (in Platform Engineering)

Our partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services, and they are looking for a Java Developer. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
 What you will do in the first three months:
Study the necessary technologies according to an individual development plan;
Practical study of new material;
Complete internship involving real projects with the application of the studied technologies
                Elvárások / Requirements
You will be successful in this role if you have: 
Learnability, engineering thinking, positive mindset, and persistence to achieve the goal;
Confident English language knowledge - ability to understand English documentation and formulate and express your thoughts in English;1+ year of relevant experience in JAVA;Working with database (relational or NoSQL) skills;Principles of web applications and HTML and CSS knowledge;Working with Git or other version control system skills;Working with automatic project building system skills (maven, Gradle)
Will be a plus:
Knowledge of Spring and Hibernate frameworks;Knowledge of JavaScript and basic frameworks such as Angular or React
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits

Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions;Benefits and social packages

Paid English courses and conversation clubs;
Opportunities for professional and personal growth;

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.
Support the Implementation of a strategy, governance policy and sanctioned platforms for Process Automation, especially for the Client's Developers (MS Power Platform), countering the risks of citizen development like lack of control, unsupported software, vulnerability to security threats.
Work on empowering citizen developers and contributing to a framework of IT services and technical support.
Evaluate and release new platforms supported by IT.
Contribute to IT Self Service governance for business platforms and developments.
Establish a network across Citizen Development communities managing common need of Citizen Developers like Best Practices and demands towards IT Services
                Elvárások / Requirements
Degree in Computer Science or related field;
Experience in MS Power Platform Architecture is a must.
4+ years of technical solutions experience including 4+ years of in a combination of relevant Big Data/Analytics areas;
Understanding of underlying infrastructure for Big Data Solutions.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits

Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ha van tapasztalatod IT üzemeltetésben, úgy érzed megállnád a helyed a kritikus rendszerek működtetésében, profin koordinálnád azokat, és biztos támogatója lennél a partnercégünk infrastruktúrájának, akkor jelentkezz IT infrastruktúra adminisztrátori pozíciónkba.
Partnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatukba keresünk új kollégát. 
Feladatok:
Az IT osztály képviselete és kapcsolattartás a cég egyéb üzemeltetési 7x24 órás felügyeletet adó szervezeti egységei felé.
Részvétel az informatikai változások kezelésének koordinálásában, mind a meglévő rendszerek módosítása során, és a bevezetésre kerülő új informatikai rendszerek telepítése és/vagy az infrastruktúrába való integrációja során, „ITIL” alapú „Change Management Process” folyamat alapján.
Támogatás és összeköttetés nyújtása a második vonalbeli támogató csoportoknak (szerver, hálózatok és teklekommunikáció menedzsment), valamint az első vonalbeli támogató csoportok (ügyfélkapu, kliens üzemeltetés) csoportoknak, kiemelten a partner csoportok helyszíni szolgáltatásán kívüli időszakaiban.
Részvétel a kritikus rendszereket érintő hibaesemények megoldásában a „ITIL” alapú „Incident Management Process” folyamat alapján.
A pozícióhoz tartozó műszakrend folyamatos, napi 12 órás (1 nap nappal(7:00-től)-1 nap éjszaka (19:00-től), 2 pihenőnap).
                Elvárások / Requirements
Elvárások:
középfokú szakirányú végzettség;
1-3 év szakmai tapasztalat IT üzemeltetésben
TCP/IP hálózati ismeretek (például CCNA ismeret)
MS Windows szerver, Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek
legalább középfokú aktív szakmai angol-nyelvtudás
“B” kategóriás jogosítvány, aktív vezetési tapasztalat
ügyfélközpontú gondolkodás
jó problémamegoldó- és szervező-készség
jó kommunikációs készség
önállóság, kreativitás, nyitottság
Előnyök:
felsőfokú szakirányú képzettség (informatikai, vagy villamos mérnök területen)
strukturált gyengeáramú kábelezési ismeretek (optika, CAT-réz)
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stabil, hosszú távú munkalehetőség
Egyedi, különleges munkakörnyezet
Nyitott, segítőkész légkör
Hosszú távú fejlődési lehetőség
Egyedülálló, speciális informatikai rendszerek és berendezések
Rendszeradminisztrátor - IT infrastruktúra / System administrator - IT Infrastructure 
Jelentkezem

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client has more than 40 years of research and development in the field of lottery systems made their company a worldwide leading supplier of lottery products. With more than 170 employees in Budapest, currently serves more than 400 customers on six continents today.
The following Challenges await You: New and further development of our cloud-enabled SCS/Microservice oriented gaming systems;Architecture, design, implementation and testing in an agile environment (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe);Implementation of new architecture principles in the new software generation
                Elvárások / Requirements
Completed education in computer science or IT;You can share us some details about your knowledge in either Angular, JavaScript, Java, and you can prove it with experience of minimum 3 years;You have knowledge of best practices (security, design patterns, responsive design, test frameworks, continuous integration and deployment);You have the following strengths: personal initiative and engagement, high level of quality awareness, accuracy and team spirit in a distributed, international team;You would like to use your excellent English on a daily basis as part of a remote team;
Advantageous for the position: Handling of databases (JPA, SQL basic knowledge);Experience in Gitlab, Maven, Jenkins, Docker and OpenShift
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Competitive payment package (13. and 14. months salaries, Home Office package)Cafeteria and Health insuranceMentoring Program, TrainingsFlexible work schedule, full timeDowntown office, in the heart of Budapest, at the foot of Buda castle (easily accessible by public transport)Indoor bike and motorcycle storageRecreation room: table soccer, darts and saunaTeam buildingsExcellent working atmosphere Open company cultureEconomically stable and growing enterprise Non-conventional domain: lottery and sports games
Java/Angular Developer

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner has more than 40 years of experience in research and development in the field of lottery systems. They are a worldwide leading supplier of lottery products, with more than 170 employees in Budapest, and currently serving more than 400 customers on six continents.
We are looking for a Test Engineer for their growing team. 
The following challenges await our new Test Engineer:
Creating and reviewing test specifications, methods, plans, cases, and test data
Test execution and monitoring for function, integration, system, performance, field and acceptance tests (manual and automated)
Error analysis and classification, defect tracking
Support of the company organization through expert advice
Working according to company development processes
Continuous improvement of testing environment and processes
Create and maintain automated tests
                Elvárások / Requirements
The requirements you should fulfill:
Completed technical education in IT
Minimum 2 years of experience as a test engineer in full time job
Technical experience in test management tools (Jira, Spira), SQL, Oracle database and Linux
Effective in problem analysis and resolution in a multi-component system
Excellent English knowledge (spoken and written)
It's an advantage if you also have:
ISTQB CT-FL
Experience and knowledge in Test Automation
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What our partner offers:
Competitive package (cafeteria, health insurance and 13. -14. months salaries)
Mentoring Program, trainings and team buildings
Flexible work schedule (home office possibility)
Indoor bike and motorcycle storage
Excellent working atmosphere (recreation room)
Open company culture
Economically stable and growing enterprise

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles, and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They allow vehicles to see, think, and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, the company offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. Our client electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate, and enhancing safe mobility.
Proactively gather, understand, and manage requirements and expectations
Contributing to the entire cycle of product development, from first ideas and brainstorming sessions over the creation of functional and technical specifications to continuously delivering solutions in an agile approach, based on business requirements and user stories
Implementation of applications in SAP ECC 6.0 and S/4 HANA environments including respective interfaces in collaboration with other teams across the internal organization and external developers
Responsible for end-to-end service delivery and operations (development, test management, deployment, maintenance, incident management)
Participation in corporate projects and orders, self-responsible performing of work packages
                Elvárások / Requirements
Degree in (Business) Information Technology or related disciplines
1-3 years of ABAP development experience (with one or more of the following, which are advantages: knowledge of Core ABAP, OOP, Enhancements, system integration, SAPUI5, oData, and CDS)
Experience and knowledge in agile software development as well as excellent analytical skills and process thinking
Fluent spoken and written English (Further language skills e.g. German are an advantage)
Flexibility, good teamwork experience, and strong communication skills in an international environment
SAP module knowledge is a plus but not required
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commissions to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training programs, and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus 
Cafeteria with optional elements
School start support
SAP Application Developer

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Partnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatunkba keresünk IT Project Coordinator kollégát elsősorban SAP-val kapcsolatos projektekhez. Amennyiben rendelkezel mély és átfogó SAP szoftver tudással és IT Project Manager képzeled el a jövődet, akkor ez a lehetőség egy remek első lépés lehet. 
Feladatok:
SAP on-premise és SAP Cloud modulokhoz kapcsolódó projektek vezetése és hozzá kapcsolódó IT feladatokat összefogása.
Meglévő rendszereken nagyobb mértékű változtatások, új funkciók kialakítása.
Részvétel nagy komplexitású, vállalati projektekben, IT oldali projekt tagként.
Együttműködés az üzleti területekkel (belső megrendelő), az üzleti folyamatok átlátása, az üzleti igényekhez megfelelő informatikai megoldások keresése.
Kapcsolattartás a SAP fejlesztő cégekkel, SAP tanácsadókkal.  
Együttműködés a többi IT területtel a szerverüzemeltetési, hálózati és cybersecurity kérdésekben.
Az ötlet felmerülésétől, a legjobb megoldás kiválasztásán keresztül a végső megvalósításig terjed majd a feladatod.
                Elvárások / Requirements
Elvárások:
Legyen felsőfokú végzettséged lehetőleg informatikai, vagy villamosmérnök területen vagy folyamatban lévő tanulmányaid.
Magas szintű SAP ismeret és releváns munkatapasztalat (R3 és/vagy S4Hana rendszer ismerete)
1-2 év vállalati oldali tapasztalatod van SAP üzemeltetésben vagy SAP bevezetési projektben.
Ismerd a legfontosabb informatikai rendszereket és folyamatokat.
Természetesen kezeld, ha angolul kell tárgyalnod.
Gondolkodj ügyfélközpontúan, és tudj magabiztosan szervezni.
Ügyesen kommunikálj a felhasználótól a külsős beszállítókig bárkivel.
Légy együttműködő, és nyitott a frappáns megoldásokra.
“B” kategóriás jogosítványodat gyakorlatban is tudd használni.
Előnyök:
Gazdasági, informatikai, vagy villamosmérnök területen szerzett felsőfokú végzettség vagy folyamatban lévő tanulmányok.
SAP R3 és/vagy S4Hana rendszer ismerete.
SAP Success Factors és SAP Ariba ismerete.
BI rendszerek ismerete.
Üzleti rendszerek bevezetésében szerzett projekt tapasztalat.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stabil, hosszú távú munkalehetőség.
Egyedi, különleges munkakörnyezet.
Nyitott, segítőkész légkör, összetartó csapat. 
Hibrid munkavégzés. 
A fejlesztések szinte minden lépése in-house történik, így láthatod egy folyamat minden apró mozzanatát.
Saját kisebb projektek gazdája leszel, így a sikerélmények sem maradnak el.
Folyamatosan bővülő, szakmailag elkötelezett csapat, ahol építheted karrieredet.
SAP Project Coordinator 
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Partnerünk, a világ egyik vezető autóipari technológiai nagyvállalata számára keresünk Beágyazott szoftverfejlesztő mérnök kollégát veszprémi központjába. A veszprémi gyár a világ valamennyi autógyártója részére állít elő gépjármű menetbiztonsági rendszerekhez magas minőségű  szenzorokat. 
Hardverközeli szoftver modulok tervezése és fejlesztése intelligens akkumulátor szenzorokhoz
Memória menedzsment, időzítők, megszakítások és SPI
Az elkészült hardverközeli modulok fejlesztői tesztelése a céleszközön (Development board, PCB, kész termék)
A felfedezett hibák analizálása, debuggolása és javítása
Programozható tápok, debuggerek, logikai analizátorok, oszcilloszkóp, függvénygenerátor aktív használata a fejlesztés/fejlesztői tesztelés során
Hatékony megoldások keresése, az erőforrások optimális kihasználásának érdekében
Meglévő szoftver komponensek optimalizálása
Az elkészült szoftver fejlesztés dokumentációja a belső folyamatok szerint 
                Elvárások / Requirements
Felsőfokú iskolai végzettség
C programozási ismeretek
Szakmai tapasztalat beágyazott rendszerek fejlesztésében (pl.: mikrovezérlőkkel szerzett tapasztalat)
Analitikus gondolkodás és jó problémamegoldási készség
Középfokú angol nyelvű írásbeli és szóbeli kommunikációs készség
Előnyt jelent, ha rendelkezel az alábbi ismeretekkel:
ARM, Assembly vagy
GIT/GitHub Rhapsody vagy
ASIL, ASPICE vagy
CANoe és CAPL-el
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Rugalmas munkaidő, home office lehetőséggel
Munkavégzéshez szükséges céges laptop és mobiltelefon biztosítása
Egészségbiztosítás, cafeteria és bónuszrendszer
Pénzügyi támogatások (munkába járás ill. hétvégi hazautazás támogatása, iskolakezdési támogatás és lakáscélú támogatás)
Coaching lehetőség igénybevétele
Változatos vállalati eseményeken való részvétel
Irodai étterem és kávézó
Parkoló és biciklitároló biztosítása
Beágyazott szoftverfejlesztő mérnök (junior)

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner is one of the world's leading automotive technology companies, with headquarters located in Veszprém. The factory produces high-quality sensors for vehicle safety systems for all car manufacturers in the world.
We are looking for a Software Development Engineer for their growing team. 
The following challenges await their new colleague:
Software test development of Advanced Driver Assistance System projects
Analyzing internal and customer requirements
Writing and executing test cases, evaluating test results
Support in analyzing root causes of detected failures
Creating test reports, resolving test environment related issues
                Elvárások / Requirements
The requirements you should fulfill:
Completed bachelor's or master’s degree in a field of engineering or computer science
Experience in C and/or Python programming
Good problem solving skills, practical thinking, engineering mindset
Confident English communication
Collaborative, open-minded, team player attitude
It's an advantage if you also have:
Knowledge in Doors, Jira, GitHub, Capl, CANoe
Experience in embedded programming, real-time systems
Knowledge of relevant automotive standards (ASPICE, AUTOSAR)
Experience with agile development methods
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What our partner offers:
Flexible work schedule (home office possibility)
Competitive package (private health insurance, cafeteria and bonus system)
Laptop and company mobile
Financial support package (for renting/buying a flat, for families regarding school starting cost and commuting costs/weekend travelling costs to permanent address)
Canteen and coffee bar
Coaching service and company events
Parking space for cars and bikes
ADAS Software Engineer

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.
Understanding business needs around big data integration, data engineering, and data operations to build end-to-end data pipelines for analytics purposes
Designing and implementing, highly performant data ingestion & transformation pipelines from multiple sources using Azure Data Factory, Databricks, and Spark/Scala/Python
Orchestrate, Automate, and maintain, and testing of Data Pipelines using Azure DevOps.
Continuously improve optimize our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data collection and data flow
Work with IT domain teams and business partners, to assist with data-related technical issues and support the end-to-end production operations of data pipelines for our Process Mining team
                Elvárások / Requirements
A Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science
5+ years of experience extracting data from SAP systems, building data pipelines using Azure Data Factory and Databricks Spark using Scala and/or Python
Sound knowledge of Data Warehousing concepts, Data models, and big data lake environment(s)
Proven experience in data analysis and writing data processing rules for ETL/ELT/ process in a warehouse environment
High levels of energy and enthusiasm to work in a multi-cultural global team and work towards common objectives
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus 
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support
Senior Data Engineer 
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for an Identity & Access Management (IAM) Analyst 2 (Officer).
GIAM Operations is a part of the company's Global Identity & Access Management group, consisting of 700 employees, located across four service centers (CSCs) in Asia, Europe and North America including 11 in-country operations. The operations is organized to have dedicated teams supporting applications utilized by different business sectors as well as platforms like CyberArk, Database, Mainframe, Active Directory, etc. Under the umbrella of Chief Information Security Office (CISO). GIAM shares the mission to protect them from access management vulnerabilities and threats to key business systems.
At our client, they groom the leaders of today and tomorrow. Take the opportunity to embark on a challenging, fulfilling and rewarding career in cybersecurity at a global financial institution.
The identity and access management (IAM) analyst is responsible for fulfilling access requests within a variety of banking applications and infrastructure systems. The objective of the role is to manage user roles and access privileges within compliance of set information security policies and standards. The analyst is expected to:
Have a strong understanding of the global identity and access management (GIAM) - products, processes, resources and tools in their respective platform with an ability to review processes in accordance with the company's policies
Support Global Identity and Access Management (GIAM) operation including weekends and public holidays on a rotational basis, as well as assigned On-call emergency support
Handle complex requests and issues independently by having a good understanding of security administration processes, practices, and policies; escalate a severity issue to relevant parties and assist in resolution
Provide audit related deliverables in short turnaround time, participate in compliance and audit related meetings
Work with the team to ensure completion of Marketplace requests, troubleshooting incident issues, closure of compliance-related action items and tasks are done within operational and controls thresholds
Understand Continuity of Business and supports its application to GIAM processes by maintaining resources like process control document up-to-date, ISA accesses, etc. within applications in scope of support
Identify potential opportunities and raise to management's attention, as well as raise ideas to improve information security controls for supported systems
Maintain availability to customers, team members, escalation manager, and senior management and handle customer and team interactions in a manner that lives up to the company's leadership principles
Effectively utilize Talent Management process (i.e., goal setup, self-assessment, feedback, individual development plan etc.) to manage own performance and work on continuous development
Assist in the development of team members by providing coaching and training particularly to new team members or new team processes
Complete other tasks/activities/projects in connection with the organizations' goals not detailed in the current job description such as automation, migration, controls culture, etc.
Demonstrate particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding the company, its clients and assets, by complying with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and reporting control issues with transparency
                Elvárások / Requirements
Qualifications
Bachelor’s Degree/University degree of any course and minimum of 5+ years of experience in an Information Security role or related field with service delivery and customer relationship management
Interprets the principle of Information Security concepts and policies and ability to apply into day-to-day work
Demonstrate an understanding of the risk associated with cyber security and the controls set in place to manage risk in identity and access management
Proven use of discretion and sound judgment on handling of information with subject to sensitivity
Flexibility to work in various shift to provide On-call, holiday and/or weekend support on a periodic frequency
Proven capability to work within a team, seeks the input of others and greets change with optimism, curiosity and resilience, ability to manage multiple priorities and adjust to evolving work needs
Understand and relates own goals to the company, business' and teams', create SMART goals and demonstrate accountability to achieve them
Consistently demonstrate clear and concise written and verbal communication in the English language as well as sensitive to audience diversity
Strong analytical skills and ability to use Lean methodology to identify process improvements; utilize Microsoft applications to analyze and interpret data
CyberArk Experience
At least 5+ years of experience in IT production support environment, and hands on of experience in Information Security, Identity & Access Management (IAM) technologies and tools.
Minimum 5+ years of experience in Privileged Identity/Access Management and working knowledge on CyberArk.
Hands - on experience in troubleshooting and implementation of account in CyberArk onboarding with working knowledge of access control models across technologies.
Knowledge on testing connectors/platforms and other network devices. Application related knowledge on AIM WCS & ECS.
Expertise in CPM, PSM, PVWA and Private Ark for trouble shooting and fixing issues in production & UAT.
Should be a key player in terms of disaster recovery and mock drill testing.
AdvantagesRelevant experience in the following platforms may be preferred in some case(s):
For Databases: Oracle, MS SQL, Sybase, Teradata, MongoDB
For Enterprise Systems: IBM RACF, CA TopSecret, AS/400, Stratus, Tandem, Unisys, VMS systems
For Wintel: Active Directory, Wintel NAS servers
For Unix: Unix OS, LDAP
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Competitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities
Identity & Access Management (IAM) Analyst 2 (Officer)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner has more than 40 years of experience in research and development in the field of lottery systems. They are a worldwide leading supplier of lottery products, with more than 170 employees in Budapest, and currently serving more than 400 customers on six continents. Currently they are looking for someone to join to their team as an C Software Engineer!
The following CHALLENGES await You:
Software development (analysis, design, implementation, integration) in the area of lottery systems in cooperation with developers of other components
Maintenance, support and assistance in test and operation of the system
Taking responsibility for the assigned software components
Working according to company development processes (ISO9000, Scrum/Kanban, SAFE4)
Continuous improvement of development environment and processes
                Elvárások / Requirements
You graduated of a technical college or university
You have minimum 2 years of software development experience in full time job
Technical experience: oMust have: C (or C++), SQLo Good to have: Linux, shell or Perl scripting, transaction processing systems, database, Java
You have effective problem solving skill in a multi-component system
You want to use your structured thinking and analytical skills
You are able to work in a team or independently
You would like to use your excellent English on a daily basis
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
If you CHOOSE THEM, they can offer:
Competitive payment package (13. and 14. months salaries, Home Office package)
Cafeteria and Health insurance
Mentoring Program, Trainings
Flexible work schedule
Indoor bike and motorcycle storage
Recreation room: table soccer, darts and sauna
Team buildings
Excellent working atmosphere
Open company culture
Economically stable and growing enterprise
Non-conventional domain: lottery and sports games
C Software Engineer

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner is an IT security company based in Switzerland. They have been on the market for over 20 years, providing security solutions of renowned customers in the area of banking, insurance, and government. Their product portfolio is being further developed and adapted to new technology trends to meet the constantly evolving requirements of digitalization, this is why they are lookig for a new
MOBILE APPLICATION TESTER
 In your daily work, you will
design, execute and document test cases for our IT security product suite (with special focus on native mobile apps)
actively participate in all stages of the agile development cycle, cooperate with product owners, engineering managers, software engineers, business analysts and fellow testers
test new functionalities, enhancements, bug-fixes, infrastructure changes, etc. in products to make sure they match the quality requirements
participate and potentially coordinate our testing guild, which synchronizes testing related activities and best practices
seek for tooling and testing process optimization, document the know-how for other testers and software engineers on a regular basis
                Elvárások / Requirements
Requirements you should ideally fulfill:
at least 3 years of experience in software testing
experience in native and cross-platform mobile testing
experience in test automation with RoboScript or Selenium or similar test automation frameworks
a good command of English (written and spoken)
experience with working in agile teams
a communicative and open personality
university degree in a related field
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What our partner offers:
Remote work opportunity and flexible working hours
extensive renumeration package including an annual bonus, company mobile and laptop, private health insurance, private nursery and kindergarten support etc.
International environment with a small friendly team
Self-development support with sponsored trainings
Half-day vacation for 24th of December and 31st of December
24/7 Employee Assistance Program (psychological and well being support, advices on finance and legal topics)
Mobile Application Tester
