ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Scrum Master 
Scrum Master
Budapest (3 Home Office / week)
gross 35-40 EUR/ hour
Your new company
AGCO Corporation is an American agricultural machinery manufacturer founded in 1990 and with its headquarters in Duluth, Georgia, United States. AGCO designs, produces and sells tractors, combines, foragers, hay tools, self-propelled sprayers, smart farming technologies, seeding and tillage equipment.
Your new role
The Scrum Master´s main responsibilities are to generate flow, ensure fast feedback (minimize WIP) and strive for relentless team improvements.
Assist in overall program/project planning and ensure cross-team dependencies are well-understood and modeled in project plans and timelines
Identify, document, and publish risks and issues related to the overall program and to define resolution paths where required
Resolve cross-team impediments and blocking issues
Collect and consolidate cross-team status for delivery to stakeholders and executive management
Schedule and conduct meetings and ceremonies in accordance with best practices for Agile/Scrum software development
Responsible for building team collaboration, commitment towards achieving sprint objectives and viewing team needs above everything else
Continuously work to improve team performance and productivity
Encourage team accountability, self-organization, and empowerment
Share common Agile practices
Promote and support the development team’s automated processes
Facilitate Retrospectives which generate new ideas for process improvement
Maintain relevant metrics that guide the development team to more efficient processes in their work and in satisfying their Product Owner and stakeholders
Maintain effective information radiators that aid transparency and encourage clear communication between the development team, the Product Owner, and stakeholders
Active participant in the local scrum chapters to share and learn new agile concepts
What you'll need to succeed
3+ years of experience in software development projects
Ability to analyze and think quickly and to resolve conflict
Knowledgeable in techniques to fill in gaps in the scrum
Ability to determine what is scrum and what is not
Experience with successful Agile techniques
Ability to work with and lead a team
Strong communication, interpersonal and mentoring skills
Knowledge of project management tools (Jira, Azure DevOps) advantageous
Fluent English
Advantages (optional):
Ability to adapt to a changing environment
Self-motivation and ability to stay focused in the middle of distraction
Experience in DevOps and SAFe practices beneficial
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Software Engineer - Senior 
About the Position:
The Backend Engineer is an Individual contributor position responsible for designing, coding and operating high performance data processing systems and backend services for our customer facing web applications on the JVM platform (primarily Scala). Our ideal candidate would have the skills and desire to understand our entire stack, from our cloud platform (AWS) through data storage technologies (such as DynamoDB, Redshift) and stream processing (Kafka) all the way to Scala/akka based services.
What You’ll Do:
• Work at a supportive and fast-growing startup with a fantastic team.
• Make an impact in the lives of tens of millions of consumers.
• Collaborate and learn from other great team members.
• Support in developing your skills and accelerating your career
What You’ll Need to Succeed:
• Experience or interest in functional programming in a typed setting;
• Understanding customer needs first and providing solutions primarily based on that
• A desire to own design and architecture end to end;
• A philosophy of iteration and continuous improvement;
• BSc or M.S in a relevant field; 2-3+ years relevant work experience
• Excellent communication and self-organization skills incl. working within and with other remote teams.
• Familiar with data storage- and processing systems (such as Postresql, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Redshift, Apache Spark);
• Experience with *nix.
• Proficient at collaborating and communicating with both local and remote team members in English and Hungarian
You will have a fast start if you have experience with:
• Scala
• Cloud environments (AWS)
• Kubernetes
• High performance HTTP APIs
The requirements listed in the job descriptions are guidelines. You don’t have to satisfy every requirement or meet every qualification listed. If your skills are transferable we would still love to hear from you.
More Details:
• Start Date: Immediately
• Status: Full-time (40 hours per week)
• Location: Budapest
• Department: Engineering
Benefits:
• Private Retirement/Pension program
• Medicover
• Commuter benefit, parking facility, bike storage
• Donation Matching for a charity of your choice (up to $500/ year)
• WFH equipment stipend
• $1,000/year in Professional Development funds
• Online English Classes
• Gym membership
• Full-flex working model (You decide whether you are working from home or from the office.)
Jelentkezem

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
DevOps Engineer 
Your new company
They are leading software and hardware provider on the emerging Vehicle-to-Vehicle and Vehicle-to-Infrastructure (V2X) communication market, with a mission to increase traffic safety and efficiency on the road. As a DevOps Engineer of the team, you will have the opportunity to build and fine-tune data intensive applications unleashing the potential of connected cars/infrastructure. In this challenging role, you’ll have the room to grow personally and professionally with the team.
Your new role
Optimize the product release process (CI/CD pipeline) 
Design, create and maintain IaC (Infrastructure-as-Code) playbooks, deployments. 
Configure, scale and set up load balancing of various open source services (Kafka, MQ Brokers, API Gateway, Kubernetes, Prometheus, etc.) 
Design high availability and fault tolerance of the systems 
Actively use PaaS/IaaS products and opportunities 
Define and monitor network, routing, load balancing and security settings 
Establish fault-tolerant release process, handling possible rollbacks 
Monitor service components 
Support product development by monitoring and maintaining the company’s on-premise tests, dev systems and installing test systems of a specific version 
Design and manage, archiving and log rotation strategie 
Design, create and monitor the network and firewall for the containerized components and the entire product 
Monitor the efficient operation of the product and components, channel the findings back to the developers
Create documentation and cooperate with the development team
What you'll need to succeed
3+ years experience in similar role 
Relevant experience with Linux based systems 
Knowledge of CI/CD systems (GitLab, Jenkins etc.) 
Hands-on experience with container technologies. 
Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Zabbix, etc.) 
Experiences with commonly used scripting languages and data exchange formats (ie.: Bash, Python, JSON, YML) 
Solid understanding of TCP/IP networking and higher level protocols related to Web technologies (HTTP, DNS) 
xperience with AWS services like EC2, S3 
Readiness to work both independently and as part of a team 
Ability and willingness to learn quickly and meet deadlines 
Great communication skills in Hungarian and English
What gives you further advantage:
Experience with automations tools (eg: Ansible)
Familiarity with build systems (Maven, Gradle, etc.)
What you'll get in return

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Software Developer (C++) 
Our partner is a global supplier of intelligent automation software. The company's software allows businesses to automate and improve business workflows by simplifying the handling of data and documents.
Scope of the job:
Senior Software Developer (specialized for C++ programming language) participates in the architecture, design, documentation, development, coding, and debugging of Windows desktop software solutions in either new software products or enhancements to existing software, under the general direction of his or her direct supervisor (Team Lead).
Your main responsibilities are:
Conducting research, where appropriate and needed, to solve specific design problems
Work independently, or in a group under the direction of a team lead, creating modules, design documentation, subsystems or applications in C++ and C#, but occasionally also using other programming languages or development tools
Work on Windows operating system with various third-party SDKs
Adhere to company’s secure software development process
Positive attitude and ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Support production users
Document his or her work in English
Participate regular team meetings and/or conference calls
Effective communication and relationships with other developers and the QA team
You are the ideal candidate if you have:
3-5 years of professional experience as a software developer
Solid knowledge of the C++ language is necessary
Solid knowledge of the C# language is preferred
Demonstrated OOD experience
Solid knowledge of Windows operating system is necessary
Working knowledge of bug tracking and version control systems (TFS preferred)
Ability to work both independently and in a team environment
Strong troubleshooting and debugging skills
Experience with PDF technology

Experience with Document Management Systems
Experience with virtualisation technologies (VMWare, Citrix, Microsoft App-V)
Knowledge of COM is preferred

Competitive salary package

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Senior BI Data Analyst 
The BI Data Analyst will support an agile development team consisting of data governance team members, data modelers, and BI developers. They will act as business analyst on the team for the data related initiatives and lead data analysis troubleshooting for data requests and reports. The analyst will assist in the development of recommendations, communications, and process improvements based on findings and insights and will serve as an expert resource on data and the data model and help coordinate analysis.
Support The BI/reporting Lead
BI Responsibilities
Transforms client requests into data deliverables with the lead data architect to include data models, data mappings and data transformation rules by working closely with Data Architect to provide input to new data models.
Provide data extraction, reports, dashboards, analysis, and consultation services across organization.
Participates in the development of reports/dashboards
Participates in the troubleshooting of data warehouse refresh issues.
Act as scrum master for the team and prepare detailed stories for developers.
Independently Works On
Identify reporting and data analysis needs.
Logs, tracks, and manages issues and requests in Azure Dev Ops.
Perform ad-hoc analysis and present results in a clear and user-friendly manner
Performs testing, issue resolution and works with developers to automate testing/data validation
Lead requirements workshops and User Acceptance Testing for new data solutions
Troubleshoot and help resolve reporting issues and approved BI help desk requests
Maintains the BI Wiki knowledgebase articles and actively participates in maintaining support policies and procedures.
Maintains and initiates BI technical documentation.
Create test cases and perform quality validation of data warehouse content to ensure accuracy.
Analyze code in BI tools (e.g., PowerBI, Tableau) to determine data usage and assist with determining the data usage accuracy.
Create and improve documentation that allows stakeholders to understand the steps of a process or reports.
Create data flow diagrams to illustrate data lineage and mapping from the data warehouse to end-point publication.
Supporting The Data Governance Lead
Data Governance Responsibilities
Support the roll-out of newly updated data governance policies across all the key data disciplines for multiple departments include (not limited to): Key Data Element identification, data lineage capture, Data Quality rule development, Data Consolidation rules.
Conduct data profiling to identify data quality issues and work with Business and IT teams to resolve the issues.
Participate in metadata collection and contribute to metadata catalog, business glossary to manage the definition and tracing of lineage of critical-data-elements.
Perform data profiling and analysis to interpret current data, analyze and derive enterprise reference values and recommend data quality rules
Work on processes for data quality management including profiling, exception handling, workflow, and metrics. Support data quality issues resolution and monitoring activities.
Validate data by verifying against requirements and success criteria.
Participate in integration analysis across data sources and targets by performing source data analysis, understanding data model, and developing source to target mapping documentation.
Partner with business teams and stakeholders to understand data requirements and perform data analysis.
Conduct data profiling, mining, and data validation to ensure data is fit for use by the business
Provide support in developing metadata, developing data quality rules, data lineage and reference data management approach
Independently Works On
Communication of work items to surface regular updates with stakeholders and regarding proposed solutions, timelines, progress, and issues
Documentation of detailed knowledge of Data Flows and processes.
Drive alignment on data decisions and enterprise definitions across different business units and stakeholders
Manage and work closely with various stakeholders (business owners, IT, department leadership, etc.) to drive through data management activities (support core data capabilities, training stakeholders, enhancing DM policy & procedure docs, etc.)
Liaise with stakeholders involved in data lineage work effort to manage ‘stitching’ activities to build end-to-end data lineage scenarios
Design and develop training programs to educate data producers and consumers on new data management processes across the data lifecycle
Help support the data council, including, socializing proposed solutions, and communicating decisions
Skills and Knowledge Required to fulfill the role:
Proficiency in English language, both written and verbally
Strong understanding of relational and multidimensional data design and development techniques including star schema, cube design, ETL.
Proficiency in SQL and Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) to maintain, develop, and improve data systems.
Experience with Salesforce Data Objects
Proven experience with programming for data analysis.
Knowledge of R programming language is nice to have but not mandatory
What our client can offer to You:
Competitive salary
Flexibility - opportunity for regular home office, but with occassional presence in Budapest office
Being a member of a global, diverse team
What you should do?
If you're interested in this role, click 'Apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your English CV.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Enterprise Technical Support Specialist 
Our client offers hybrid work opportunity (1-2 days per week in regular office).
Office location: Budapest
What you will do:
Our client is a U.S.-owned intelligent automation software provider with 200 co-workers in Hungary. We have an international team who provides enterprise-level technical support of our software products – the team members are located in various places in Europe.
The Technical Support Engineer is responsible for providing business critical technical support to partners, highly-skilled customers, IT and functional staff, including Database Administrators, System Administrators, IT Managers and Directors, line-of-business Managers and Financial Controllers.
In addition, the position requires frequent interaction with Product Development and Consulting Services, to deliver complete, comprehensive solutions and constant software and process improvement.  In this role you will be providing telephone and/or Web based support for software products.
Key Responsibilities:
Take ownership of customer issues and see problems through to resolution and provide enterprise level technical support to our customers via phone, web, and email and other support channels as required.
Research, diagnose, troubleshoot and identify solutions to resolve customer issues related to application use, design and configuration.
Effectively communicate complex technical issues to a broad range of customers and departments within the company, such as product management, software engineering, sales, and quality assurance.
Mentor junior colleagues in your technical support domain
Elevate customer issues to senior support engineers as needed, providing detail description of problems along with steps taken to analyze the problem.
Use approved protocol to communicate with Development engineers on the analysis of software issues.
Elevate hot fix requests to support managers for processing based on approved protocol.
Participate in regular support team meetings.
Contribute to the body of knowledge by creating and maintaining knowledge base articles and other technical documents.
Prepare test systems for replication of user issues. 
What you need to have:
Minimum of 2 to 5 years providing enterprise level technical support experience – best option is that you have already supported internal stakeholders.
Experience with network trouble shooting in an enterprise environment.
Experience with network software diagnostic tools, such as Wireshark.
Familiarity with Windows diagnostic tools, such as Process Monitor and Event Viewer.
Knowledge of and experience with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Visio, PowerPoint).
Fluent English language skills both written and verbal
A bachelor's degree in computer science, computer information systems or related experience is considered as advantage
Resourceful team player with strong interpersonal skills.
Result-oriented with strong problem-solving skills.
Desired Skills and Knowledge considered as plus:

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
DevOps Engineer 
Your new company
Because of the rapidly changing environment, they had set their aim to become the most data & technology-driven airline in the world. Changing our way of working, modernizing our technology stack and architecture and the right positioning of people is key to achieving this ambition. We have organized our product teams around business processes, where together business and IT are end-to-end responsible for the digital products and services that support our operation.  We are looking for a software engineer with a specialization on DevSecOps, who collaboratively organize all necessary  on the automation and configuration management of environments tasks to help maximize the flow of value. As a software engineer, you will work shoulder to shoulder with other software engineers, like backend specialists, data scientists, domain experts, and frontline staff to shape the future of them and the aviation industry.
Your new role
As a DevSecOps specialist, you will apply your skills to change the way KLM works, driving innovation 
transforming us into a truly data-driven organization. We value both technical expertise (analysis, design & architecture, engineering, quality assurance and DevSecOps of course) as well as the interpersonal parts of the job (coaching, consulting, coordination, and support).  As a software engineer DevSecOps your key result areas are:
Make use of right technology and govern architecture for the environments in line with the organizational objectives, ensuring that the right technologies are chosen to strike an optimal balance between achieving business goals, supporting the realization of functional and technical requirements, environments and continuity costs 
Build, migrate, implement and maintain environments and key technologies for COTS/SAAS apps by using the IaC principles, showing leadership towards OPS- & Security teams, and collaborate with the development team on the continual process improvement.
Build, implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines and its processes to support development teams with automated testing and security scanning while keeping an eye on FinOps.
Support the migration of our critical-, but also legacy landscape from on-premises to the Azure and Google Cloud environment in line with our strategical objectives. Experience with migrating COTS to SAAS is a pre.
Design and implement the overall architecture aligned with other self-engineered products to deliver
Translate development team needs into compelling solutions and deliver them to end users so that business value is created
Take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivery, maintenance, monitoring, and support of the IaC landscape
Foster a culture where state-of-the-art approaches, tooling and technologies are applied as fits with the mission of the department, the KPI’s and desired business impact
What you'll need to succeed
We are looking for passionate and talented DevSecOps engineers, for curious builders who are biased towards action, communication and are thriving in a fast-paced and international environment.   We have found that people who match the following requirements are the ones who fit us best:  
Preferably Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or other relevant fields
Minimum of 5 years of professional experience with engineering CI/CD pipelines on-premise and/or Azure/GCP environments. 
Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in performing and automate COTS/SAAS environments by using the IaC and monitor everything principles, while industrializing environments
Knowledge of CI/CD techniques and tooling (e.g., k8s, GitHub Actions, Bamboo, Jenkins, Git, etc.)
Proficient with automation tooling, configuration management and problem finding
Experience with bringing enterprise applications to production and supporting development teams 
Experience in coaching and knowledge sharing to familiarize teams with DevSecOps best practices
Knowledge with and experience in agile way of working (e.g., SAFe, Scrum, Agile)
Great communication skills, written and spoken (English) and team spirit 
This role requires participation in our on-call support rotation
Available to come to the office 3 days a week, there are no formal rules about work from home yet, but most teams have a hybrid way of working
In addition, the following requirements are considered nice to have:  
Preferable being a certified Cloud DevOps Engineer for Azure / GCP / AWS
Experience in the developer- / infra related role in previous jobs
What you'll get in return
A competitive salary depending on your level and experience
10% of your time set aside for personal learning and development 
An excellent pension scheme, profit sharing, and yearly bonus.
Substantial discounts on flight tickets (after 6 months of employment)
A travel allowance
Discount on health insurance
A learning budget

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Data Scientist 
Data Scientist
Fully remote
25-35 EUR/ hour
Your new company
In our AGCO journey towards customer centricity and digitalization, the necessity for leverage data and advanced analytics to optimize customers' machine performance.
This position will support the Proactive Customer Services organization to develop and implement disruptive approaches to enhance AGCO’s ability support customers and grow the aftersales business. The position will enhance development of data uses through AIML techniques, predictive and statistical analysis, data exploration and visualization.
The purpose of this position is to analyze machine telemetry data - AGCO IOT data and execute advanced analytical models and make recommendations on conditional and predictive maintenance use-cases.
The role will be part of a global Proactive Customer Services team working in a cloud environment and addressing use-cases.
Your new role
Work with business partners to understand inquiries and opportunities in which analytics could be applied to generate identify issues in time-series data and make recommendations on analytical findings.
Accountable for delivering world-class data science outcomes, solving complex analytical problems using quantitative approaches with a unique blend of analytical, mathematical and technical skills in programming languages that are used in big data environments, and supporting model and insight acceptance and understanding.
As needed for complex use-cases, design, build and deploy high-performance prediction and optimization algorithms to solve business problems and facilitate new digital applications – particularly focused on machine data from telematics and leveraging other sources of data.
Research, design, implement and validate cutting-edge algorithms to analyze diverse sources of data to achieve targeted outcomes
Generate reports, annotated code, and other project artifacts to effectively document, archive, and communicate work and outcomes
Evaluate model accuracy and report on performance of insights. Participate in peer review of models and code.
Enhance understanding of data science and models in order to increase acceptance and demystify analytics output.
What you'll need to succeed
Data savvy person with experience (2-4 years) in data science
Hands-on knowledge in SQL, Python or R
Experience with IOT data
Excellent written and spoken communication in English
Familiarity with conditional and predictive modeling concepts, machine-learning approaches, clustering and classification techniques, recommendation and optimization algorithms
Advantages:
Intellectual curiosity, continuous improvement
Knowledge of Salesforce is an advantage
Knowledge of industrial mechanical topics is an advantage
Knowledge of cloud providers (Databricks, AWS S3, EC2, Athena, Redshift, SageMaker, etc) is an advantage

Az új munkahelyed
Az Uniqa Raiffeisen Software Service Kft. a Raiffeisen bankcsoport és az UNIQA biztosító csoport közös fejlesztő cége. A budapesti székhelyű magyar leányvállalat meghatározó szerepet játszik a tulajdonosok kelet- és közép-európai érdekeltségei között.

XML ismeretek (XML XSL, XPath, XQuery)
MS Windows, Linux, Unix operációs rendszerek ismerete és biztonságos kezelése
Web- és alkalmazásszerverek területén szerzett tapasztalat (Apache Tomcat, JBoss AS,)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
SAP Basis Consultant 
Location: full remote
Salary: 55 EUR/hour
Who Are We:
There’s the field where farmers use our machines. And then there’s the field of agricultural equipment makers…And figuratively speaking, we’re doing everything we can to un-level it.
What You Will you do
SAP Basis Administration including analysis of the SAP system log, monitoring of processes, analysis and clean-up of update terminations, analysis and clean-up of lock entries and checking for ABAP dumps. Schedule, troubleshoot and maintain application batch jobs, administer SAP logon groups, maintain SAP system profile parameters and optimize the SAP system.
SAP Client Operations including the creation, copying and deletion of clients in or between systems, perform export/import operations between SAP instances, transport clients between systems and maintain instance/client configuration documentation.
Transports & Change Control including the release and transfer of transport orders, maintain transport protocols, plan and implement regularly scheduled change requests, resolve technical and functional transport problems and document transport activities. Apply recommended SAP support packs and test and accept object changes.
Print Management including maintaining printers within SAP software, analysis of faulty output requests, reorganization of the SAP spool system, provisioning and set-up for pre-printed forms and troubleshooting of spool and print problems within the SAP system.
Interface Administration including the production, administration and running of batch input sessions. Monitor, administer, analyze and reorganize IDoc’s, interface documentation and testing and documentation of interface restart scenarios.
SAP security support for client audit requirements, regular data and access security checks and system auditing.
SAP PI including the installation of adapters provided by SAP and external partners, configuration of the required system connections to partner systems and activation of basic PI monitoring. Extended monitoring and monitoring of queues, configuration of adapters, examination of incorrect messages and archiving of messages.
Technical skills:
Manage and Support SAP Technical Infrastructure components that run on ABAP and/or JAVA stacks
Responsible for Performance Tuning/Installations/Documentation/Upgrades/Monitoring of SAP Application/ NetWeaver Suite of products like ERP, BW, PI, SRM, Portal, GRC on AIX/DB2 platforms
Research and Install Enhancement packages and SAP delivered Business Content for SAP Applications
In-depth knowledge of ABAP and JAVA monitoring tools for root cause analysis such as SolMan monitoring, DB cockpit and Wily Introscope
Evaluate Early Watch/Service Level reports and come up with an action plan to address the gaps on an ongoing basis
Perform Client Copies/System Refreshes
Configuration of Transport Management System configurations/Charm
Capacity planning activities to track database growth, participates in sizing and SAP archiving activities
Support current SAP DR Strategy and Backup-Recovery/Configuration/ upgrade/ monitoring of DB2 and HANA databases in an SAP environment.
Develop and maintain UNIX shell scripts required for monitoring alerts and process automation. Work with Unix/Storage and Network teams to configure system
    Apply Now!

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They are looking for a new senior colleague to join their team in the following position:
IT ARCHITECT
Your focus will be:
Architectural design for industry 4.0 solutions using domain-driven design and microservice architecture patterns
Design and development of a computer vision/AI solution framework - including machine learning, backend and frontend development, corresponding DevOps and automation tasks
Design of technical solution architectures based on Microsoft Azure services, Databricks, .NET / C#, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Working together with other professionals like product owners, business experts, solution architects and the development team to engineer solutions aligned with architecture guidelines.
Documentation and presenting results to the program leadership and stakeholders
Steering of the development team, orchestration of activities during the sprint and assurance of quality of results
                Elvárások / Requirements
Requirements you should fulfill:
At least a Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred) in IT
At least 3 years of experience in a similar position (Lead software developer, IT Architect etc.)
Some experience in agile software development
Practical experience with Azure, DevOps, .NET, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Familiarity with the fundamentals of Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, and MLOps
A good understanding of low-level communication protocols.
Excellent verbal and written English language skills (German is a plus)
Soft skills we look for:
Team player attitude 
A result-oriented and systematic work approach
Excellent conceptual skills and an ability to structure complex topics
Autonomous, self-driven, flexible, reliable, and keen to push things forward
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What our partner offers:
Home office or remote work opportunity
A job full of challenges and high-level professional activities
Stable international company background
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
School start support
IT Architect (.NET)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Data Analyst Intern 
 As the world’s largest asset manager and a leading provider of financial technology, BlackRock’s purpose is to help more and more people experience financial well-being. Founded in 1988 and based in New York City, BlackRock operates globally, with more than 70 offices spanning 40 countries, and clients in over 100 countries. They opened their Budapest Innovation Hub in 2017, with the idea that technology and finance go hand-in-hand – something they’ve believed since their founding. As a firm and together with their clients, they work to create a more equitable and resilient world, today and for generations to come.
 Feladatok:
  Showing ownership and contributing to team’s target deliverables 
  Proactively communicating assignment progress (status, challenges, success) to team members, supervisors, and stakeholders 
  Organizing and combining data input from multiple sources to produce internal recurring and ad-hoc reports 
  Supporting process re-design/improvement of automated reporting 
  Leveraging data and stakeholder feedback to help evolve report content and presentation 
  Collaborating with team members and peers on common projects

Research business requirements and documenting the relationships between the components of the application system (i.e., end users, business processes, data, applications, and devices)
What should bring along?
Bachelor’s degree in computer engineering or equivalent preferred
At least 1 years of relevant experience (preferred)
Good communication skills in written and spoken English
Excellent problem solving and analytical skills
Visual Studio, Oracle, MS SQL, GIT, SVN, Atlassian skills
.Net, C#, PL-SQL, TSQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript skills

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ki a Partnerünk, aki hirdet?
Mint független informatikai tanácsadó és szolgáltató cég, támogatják nemzetközi ügyfeleiket, rugalmas és innovatív, személyre szabott informatikai megoldásokkal. Fő hangsúly a pénzügyi és energiaszolgáltatókra, az ipari cégekre, a média és telekommunikációs vállalatokra tevődik. Jelenleg hét európai országban vannak jelen, szakmai érdemeik és folyamatos növekedésük több mint 500 munkatársuk kiváló teljesítményének köszönhető.
Nyitott, dinamikus csapatukba keresünk most új kollégát az alábbi pozíció betöltésére:
SZOFTVERTESZTELŐ MÉRNÖK - BEÁGYAZOTT RENDSZEREK

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
At our Client they are on a mission to modernize voice with trust, identity, and intelligence. They are protecting everyday people from spam and fraud calls, connecting businesses with their customers, and helping carriers secure their networks for all. In 2015, the Company founder saw the increasing need for innovation in the voice channel and began building the first caller ID and spam blocking apps for mobile while at Whitepages. In early 2016, the Company spun out of Whitepages and brought its technology to market through Samsung Smart Call, the first-ever network-based spam solution with AT&T, and the our Client's consumer app. Three years later in 2019, they brought our Client connect to market, a B2B branded call service that enables enterprise companies to connect to the consumers they are trying to reach. The combination of Protect, Connect, and the app has resulted in the world's largest Voice Performance Platform with over 200M monthly active users.
About the Position
The Backend Engineer is an Individual contributor position responsible for designing, coding and operating high performance data processing systems and backend services for their customer facing web services on the JVM platform (primarily Scala). Our ideal candidate would have the skills and desire to understand their entire stack, from their cloud platform (AWS) through data storage technologies (such as DynamoDB, Redshift) and stream processing (Kafka) all the way to Scala/akka based services.
About the Team
Our Client's Protect team has built a leading fraud detection system for phone calls used by millions of users around the Globe through mobile and network integrations. Their mission is to eliminate unwanted calls and bring trust and intelligence back to the phone calls by using modern technologies and machine learning. Their innovative platform is able to process hundreds of thousands requests and runs half million models per second.
What You’ll Do
Work at a supportive and fast-growing startup with a fantastic team.
Build and operate world class services in the field of phone fraud detection
Make an impact in the lives of tens of millions of consumers on a daily basis
Collaborate and learn from other great team members.
Support in developing your skills and accelerating your career
                Elvárások / Requirements
Experience or interest in functional programming in a typed setting; 
A philosophy of iteration and continuous improvement;
Experience building highly scalable and -available production services;
BSc or M.S in a relevant field; 2+ years relevant work experience;
Excellent communication and self-organization skills incl. working within and with other remote teams;
Familiar with data storage- and processing systems (such as Postresql, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Redshift, Apache Spark, ElasticSearch, Redis);
Experience with *nix.
Proficient at collaborating and communicating with both local and remote team members in English and Hungarian
You will have a fast start if you have experience with:
Scala
Cloud environments (AWS)
Big-data technologies and platforms (Spark, Athena/Presto, Zeppelin, Databricks)
Modern deployment environments (Kubernetes, Docker)
High performance HTTP API
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Private Retirement/Pension program 
Medicover
Commuter benefit, parking facility, bike storage
Donation Matching for a charity of your choice (up to $500/ year)
WFH equipment stipend 
$1,000/year in Professional Development funds
Online English Classes
Gym membership
Full-flex working model (You decide whether you are working from home or from the office.)
Backend Engineer (Scala) - protect team

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. We are looking for a Lead developer to be part of their team. 
Your Tasks will be:
Responsibility for the architecture and interface design, requirements analysis and subsequent implementation for an end-to-end IoT cloud;Responsibility for conceptual tasks in backend development with high demands on data security and data protection;Proactive source of ideas for new technologies, systems, processes and optimizations;Analysis, conception, implementation and testing of new customer-specific applications and modules.Support for the requirements survey, presentation of the results to the customer and technical and technological advice;Coaching and technical management of 10 developers in the team;The applications that you are responsible for implementing are based on Java, JavaScript, Python and Go. Other programming languages can also be integrated. The deployment infrastructure is in the cloud.

PLC technikus 
Nemzetközi gyártótevékenységet végző vállalatnál szeretnél tapasztalatot szerezni vagy kamatoztatni?
30 éves múltra visszatekintő, autóipari beszállító cég keres PLC technikus munkatársat. Amennyiben motivált vagy az alább szereplő feladatok elvégzésére, angolul is boldogulsz és vonz az autóipar világa, akkor várjuk jelentkezésed az oldal alján!
Ne habozz!
 Feladatok
5S szabályai alapján a gyártómunka elvégzése
Karbantartási feladatok ellátása (pl. csavarozás)
Műszaki magasszintű működés biztosítása (gépek, berendezések)
Karbantartók támogatása elektromos rajzok és előírások tekintetében
Feljegyzések készítése a javításokról
Hatékonyság növelése folyamatfejlesztéssel

Műszaki supportos IT rendszergazda 
munkatársat keresünk
A Mohanet Mobilsystems Zrt, a magyarországi M2M szektor meghatározó fejlesztő és szolgáltató vállalata műszaki supportos IT rendszergazda munkatársat keres az általa gyártott távfelügyeleti rendszerek hardverek és szoftverek műszaki támogatásához.
Elvárások:
Műszaki végzettség
LINUX alapú szerverek üzemeltetői szintű ismerete
Adatbázis kiszolgálók felépítésének és működösének általános ismerete
Hálózati, rendszergazdai ismeretek
Önállóság
Pontos, precíz, gyors munkavégzés
Előnyt jelent:
Felsőfokú műszaki végzettség
Min. 2 év, hasonló munkakörben tapasztalat
Alapfokú angol nyelvismeret
Feladatok:
Műszaki support tevékenység ellátása a vállalat partnerei számára munkaidőben és ügyeleti jelleggel.
Üzemeltetői szintű kapcsolattartás a vállalat belső és külső fejlesztőivel.
Fejlesztésekkel kapcsolatos ügyféligények összegyűjtése és továbbítása.
Új termékek, szoftver bevezetésénél, a termék tesztelése és értékelése a minőség ellenőrzési vezető jelzései alapján.
Telepítési és kezelési utasítások megírása.
Új partnerek szervereinek beszerzése, saját telephelyen történő telepítése, tesztelése.
A vállalat belső rendszergazdai feladatainak ellátása. Kapcsolattartás a külsős rendszergazdával.

Versenyképes fizetés
Notebook

Cafeteria

Budapest, 15. kerület

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They allow vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, the company offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. Our client electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.
Self-dependent management of complex global production and quality launch/rollout projects, while focusing on IT standards, business satisfaction and operational excellence 
Ensuring launch IT Production projects success in scope, quality, time and cost by controlling project budget, deciding countermeasures on his own authority within the specified project canvas and managing project risk actively
Special focus is placed on defining, organizing and conducting training and communication as well as user experience and knowledge sharing across all projects to ensure trends are paid respect in the short term and long term alike
Leading the respective launch projects with the necessary departments especially ensuring handover from build phase to service management as well as controlling that all infrastructure requirements for implementation are met
Drive programs and roadmaps to support business change. e.g. new production facilities and represent these within the corporate, divisional and regional domains
                Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor Degree in computer science, business administration, or engineering is required
Minimum of 5 years of MES experience highly preferred in the automotive manufacturing and/or quality systems.
Minimum of 3 years of IT/Project Management experience within an international environment preferred
Working knowledge of information systems required, with experience in automotive manufacturing and/or quality systems highly preferred
Critical thinking, excellent communication and research skills
A demonstrated ability for managing large/complex projects preferred
Business fluent English skills, both written and spoken

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Aegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, the UK, and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, and an Asset Management organization with locations in the UK, US, NL, and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit, and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, they foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. They are a people business, and they recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. They value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
What You Will Do:
Develop, Deploy and Support Cloud Infrastructure, as code artifacts or modules;Design, Build and Maintain Cloud infrastructure and applications;Support and deliver using Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipelines;Design and Support resiliency and scalability using AWS and other cloud platforms;Enable systems with automated monitoring and alerting;Support the Team and Customers with day-to-day requests, Change and Incident tickets;Support Technology stack refresh on Systems (end-to-end) when required;Ensure automated security is built into each technology stack
                Elvárások / Requirements
What You Will Need:
Qualifications;Four-year Computer Science or related degree, or equivalent work experience;3 or more years of experience including 2 years of experience in supporting enterprise-level platform installations;3 years of experience working with cloud providers (Azure/ AWS, etc..);At least 2 years of experience with Agile development and planning methodologies;2-3 years of experience working in a high performing DevOps team or role;2-3 years of experience in performance monitoring, alerting and troubleshooting in an enterprise;Strong, holistic understanding of the internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layer
Preferred:
Experience working in roles with a strong focus on security, including automated alerting and response;Demonstrate a strong understanding of API’s and API Security;Demonstrated ability in automated code testing;Certifications in relevant technologies, methods, or platforms;Demonstrate the key critical behaviors of commitment to task, communication, customer focus, decision;Making/problem solving, tolerance of ambiguity, planning, prioritizing, and goal setting
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Compensation:
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people-centric, positive, and supportive work environment

SOFTWARE FEJLESZTŐ 
Feladatok:
		Szoftverfejlesztés és szoftverdizájn,
		Új szoftverfunkciók fejlesztése,
		Szoftver hibák rögzítése és javítása,
		Ügyfél specifikációk elemzése,
		Szoftver specifikációk kidolgozásában való részvétel,
		Modul és integrációs tesztek végrehajtása,
		Szoftverfejlesztéshez kapcsolódó dokumentáció elkészítése,
		Felhasználási esetek kidolgozása és modellezése a fejlesztő csapattal együttműködve.
Elvárások:
		Főiskolai vagy egyetemi végzettség (elsősorban IT, Közlekedésmérnöki vagy Villamosmérnöki területről),
		Legalább 1-3 év fejlesztői gyakorlat objektumorientált programozási nyelven (preferáltan C programnyelv),
		Use case elkészítésében szerzett tapasztalat,
		Hagyományos (Waterfall, V-modell, CMMI) és/vagy agilis fejlesztési módszertanok ismerete,
		Hajlandóság procedurális, erősen típusos nyelveken való fejlesztésre,
		Szoftverminőség biztosítási eszközök ismerete,
		Verziókezelő rendszerek ismerete,
		Hibakezelő rendszerek ismerete,
		Szisztematikus megközelítés a tesztesetek írásánál, átfogó és nem eseti probléma analízis,
		Kommunikációképes angol nyelvtudás szóban és írásban egyaránt.
Előnyök:
		Legalább alapszintű vasúti ismeretek, tapasztalatok biztosító- és jelzőberendezések terén,
		Programozási nyelvek (CHILL vagy PASCAL),
		Szoftverminőség biztosítási eszközök ismerete (Checkstyle, GCov),
		Verziókezelő rendszerek ismerete (ClearCase),
		Hibakezelő rendszerek ismerete (JIRA),
		Német nyelvtudás.
Juttatások:
		Megbízható, stabil vállalati háttér,
		Dinamikus, összetartó csapat,
		Izgalmas projektek,
		Folyamatos szakmai fejlődés lehetősége,
		Kiegyensúlyozott munkakörnyezet.
 Munkavégzés ideje: Hétfőtől – péntekig rugalmas munkarend (heti 40ó)
 Munkavégzés helye: Győr
 Amennyiben a pozíció felkeltette érdeklődését, a JELENTKEZÉS gombra kattintva adhatja le jelentkezését, angol és magyar nyelvű önéletrajz csatolásával.
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
 Gyártástámogató mérnök 
A Datalogic globális vezető szerepet tölt be a több technológiájú automatikus adatrögzítő és ipari automatizálási piacokon. A vonalkód-olvasók, mobil számítógépek, érzékelők, képalkotó rendszerek és lézeres jelölő rendszerek világszínvonalú gyártójaként, a Datalogic innovatív megoldásokat kínál a teljes körű alkalmazások számára a kiskereskedelmi, szállítási és logisztikai, gyártási és egészségügyi ágazatokban.
A bolognai székhelyű Datalogic csoport 1972-es megalapítása óta, folyamatos fejlődésének köszönhetően, mára több mint 3500 munkavállalóval a világ 30 országában van jelen.
Ha szeretnél egy fiatalos dinamikus csapat tagja lenni, vonzó munkakörnyezetben akkor köztünk a helyed.
Balatonboglári gyárunkba keresünk Gyártástámogató mérnök pozícióba új kollégát.
Főbb feladataid a következők lesznek:
Folyamatfejlesztő és hatékonyságnövelő projektek koordinálása
Folyamatok tervezése LEAN szerint, termelési layoutok rajzolása Autocad használatával
Mozdulatelemzések, ergonómiai elemzések
Lean technikák gyakorlati alkalmazása (5S, MUDA, OEE stb.)
Veszteségek azonosítása, akciók kidolgozása
Standard munkafolyamatok kialakítása
Fejlesztések költség és megtérülés kalkulációja
Gépek, berendezések hatékonyságának növelése, fejlesztése, nyomonkövetése
Gyártási dokumentációk kidolgozása, karbantartása, munkautasítások készítése
Részvétel NPI folyamatokban
Próbagyártások felügyelete, szakmai támogatása
Kisebb eszközök, JIG-ek specifikációja, tervezése (2D/3D)
Elvárásaink a pozíció betöltésével kapcsolatosan:
Villamos, gépész, vagy mechatronikai mérnök felsőfokú végzettség
Hasonló munkakörben, elektronikai gyártásban szerzett releváns 5 éves tapasztalat
Teszt- és gyártási folyamatok és kapcsolódó rendszerek ismerete
Önálló, lendületes és konstruktív munkavégzés
LEAN Technikák ismerete
Kommunikációs szintű angol nyelvtudás
Magabiztos, felhasználói szintű Office, különösen Excel, Access ismeret
Autocad (2D) gyakorlott használata
SAP ismeret és 3D tervezőprogram ismeret előnyt jelent
Magasszintű problémamegoldó képesség, rendszerszemlélet
Amit mi kínálunk számodra:
Versenyképes jövedelemmel és széleskörű juttatási csomaggal várunk, úgy, mint önkéntes nyugdíjpénztári hozzájárulás, Edenred kártya feltöltése nettó 45000 Ft/hónap és 45 Ft/Km munkába járási támogatás
Modern munkakörnyezet, zöldmezős beruházás keretében épült infrastruktúra vár Téged
Nyitott és befogadó kultúra jellemez bennünket
Biztos, nemzetközi háttér áll mögöttünk
Jelentkezésed magyar és angol nyelvű Önéletrajzod megküldésével várjuk.

INFORMATIKUS 
Megbízóm a légszűrés-technika piacvezető szakértőjeként, világszínvonalú termékeket szállít autóipari, gyógyszeripari és tisztatéri légtisztítási megoldásokhoz.
	A cég alapelvei a csapatszellem, a nyílt kommunikáció, és a folyamatos fejlődés.
Telephelyük bővítése kapcsán keresik IT csapatuk új tagját a következő munkakörbe:
Informatikus
Munkavégzés helye: Polgárdi/Fejér megye
Feladatok:
A vállalat hálózati infrastruktúrájának első  szintű kezelése, valamint az alkalmazások és hardverek hatékony végfelhasználói támogatása
Műszaki tanácsadóként járjon el minden számítógéppel kapcsolatos kérdésben, és irányítsa az informatikai megoldások megvalósítását
Koordinálja a releváns IT rendszerek szervezését és fejlesztését
Ellenőrizze és figyelje az összes számítógép-vásárlást, biztosítva a kompatibilitást a meglévő rendszerekkel a költségvetési korlátokkal összhangban
Kapcsolattartás a cégcsoporton belüli szakmai felettessel
Koordinálja és segíti a végfelhasználók képzését és támogatja a fejlesztési követelményeket
Támogatja az adatok biztonságát megfelelő eljárások bevezetésével, fenntartásával és felülvizsgálatával
Gondoskodjon arról, hogy az informatikai berendezések használata megfeleljen az összes vonatkozó szabványnak és jogi követelménynek
Elvárások:
Informatikai felsőfokú végzettség
2-5 év releváns munkatapasztalat informatikai nemzetközi környezetben, ipari vállalatokban vagy gyártó vállalkozásokban
Releváns kompetencia az ERP rendszerekben (SAP, MS Dynamics NAV)
Magas szintű kompetencia az SQL programozásban
Az informatikai folyamatok, köztük a szoftver / hardver alkalmazások alapos ismerete
Problémamegoldó készség, több feladat / projekt kezelésének képessége, megfelelő prioritások meghatározása
Képesség az ismeretek és készségek átadására a különböző szintű és kompetenciájú más felhasználók számára
Hatékony kommunikáció képessége minden szinten
Jó magyar és angol kommunikációs készség (írásban és szóban)
Önálló munkavégzés, nemzetközi csapattal való együttműködési hajlandóság
Amit Megbízónk nyújt:
Multinacionális környezet fejlődési/képzési lehetőségekkel
Versenyképes jövedelem+ Cafeteria+ Bónusz+bejárási költségtérítés
Hosszútávú munkalehetőség, egy dinamikusan fejlődő csapat tagjaként
Tervezhető, kiszámítható munkaidő, céges rendezvények, gyümölcsnapok

Senior Azure Cloud Architect 
Country: Hungary (+36) • Budapest
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Azure Cloude Architect for a new venture of one of the region's most established multinational company.
Duties:
• Lead the foundation of the Cloud Architecture & Governance for the SME Corporation
• Support the Azure DataPlatform Architecture design
• Support the Azure DevOps Architecture design
• Support the Azure RunTime Infrastructure design for the core business enabler Marketplace Platform in Azure Kubernetes Services and other native Azure Cloud Services
• Support the Azure EventHub/DataServices Integration Architecture design
• Design and Prepare the Policy Environment within Azure Cloud
• Support the Azure RunTime Infrastructure design for the core business enabler Marketplace Platform in Azure Kubernetes Services and other native Azure Cloud Services
• Support integration initiatives and related Solution Architecture in/outbound from Azure Cloud
• Support SaaS ICT Architecture and Implementation in Azure
• Design and Prepare the Policy Environment within Azure Cloud
• Support integration initiatives and related Solution Architecture in/outbound from Azure Cloud
• Work together with the Chief Security Architect / Virtual CISO on Cloud Security Topics
• Support implementation of mitigations per the Business Continuity Plan
• Support the preparation of an IT Policy for the Enterprise
Requirements and skills:
• Experience in setting up and operating an Azure Cloud environment for a SME
• Expert within Azure IaaS, SaaS Cloud Services and Architecture
• Experience with Azure Networking services, Azure Security and Identity services, Azure Integration services, Azure SQL Database, SQL Server, SQL Server IaaS, firewalls, Web App proxies, Bash, BGP, Chef, Puppet, PowerShell scripting, Azure Monitor and Application Insights
• Experience with configuring, deploying and operating public cloud services (e.g. Azure, AWS, GCP)
• Expertise in infrastructure as code (e.g., cloud formation, ARM, Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet)
• Basic familiarity with network features • e.g. cloud network topology, BGP, routing, web (REST) APIs
• Experience with configuring, deploying and operating public cloud services (e.g. Azure, AWS, GCP)
• Awareness in open source tools & scripting language (e.g. Python, powershell, Shell)
• Deep understanding of software development lifecycles and cloud economics, incl. knowledge of consumption-driven TCO
• Expertise in infrastructure as code (e.g., cloud formation, ARM, Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet)
• High availability engineering experience (region, availability zone, data replication clustering)
• Good knowledge of security implications of public & private cloud infra design
• Experience with Cloud Automation and Infrastructure as Code
• Microsoft Certified Azure Architect is a plus
Command of languages:
Good command of English
Client company profile:
Our client company is a new venture for one of the region's most established multinational company. Strong backing and commitment from the Shareholders
What they offer:
• Competitive Compensation Package and Incentive System (13th and 14th Month salary bonus + Annual financial bonus based on company goals)
• 3 days home office/week, flexible working hours
• Less Regulation, Fast Moving Agile Organization
• State of the Art Technologies and Capabilities relying on in-house developed Products and 3rd Party Cloud SaaS / PaaS
• Lots of room for career growth
• Efficient Business Operations, lean Processes and low level of Bureaucracy
• Regional ambition, potential international expansion ahead
Further information:
By submitting an application form or sending your curriculum vitae electronically, you will be giving the employees of PBS International Ltd. the approval and acknowledgement to access, handle and record the personal details you have submitted for application and registration processing. During the course of your application and in the future event that a prospective party expresses professional interest in you, we will only forward your details onto our clients upon your exclusive and prior approval. For a more detailed view of our data security terms and to accept all of our terms and conditions please visit the link here: https://www.pbs-job.hu/?/data-protection/for-employees

Amennyiben ezt az állást a MÁV-csoport egyik munkavállalója javasolta számodra, jelentkezésedkor választd ki a Munkavállalói ajánlási program pontot és töltsd ki az ajánló adatait!
Új munkatársunk feladatai lesznek
- első szintű ügyfélszolgálati támogatás ellátása a HelpDesk-en
- hibabejelentések beazonosítása, a feladatok eszkalációja
- bejelentések, hibajegyek rögzítése, nyomon követése a végleges megoldásig
- az on-line rendszerek monitorozási, rendszer-felügyeleti teendőinek ellátása
- szoftverek, alkalmazások távoli telepítése, és első színtű hibaelhárítása
- havária feladatok kezelése
- ügyfélszolgálati rendszerben történő adminisztráció
Amire a munkakör betöltéséhez szükség van
- szakirányú középfokú állami iskolai végzettség, vagy általános érettségi és szakirányú középfokú végzettség
- MS Windows operációs és irodai rendszerek professzionális ismerete
- a következő alkalmazások ismerete: Office alkalmazások; Active Directory; szerver konzolalkalmazások; távmenedzselő eszközök; ügyfélszolgálati rendszerek
- IP hálózatok alapfokú ismerete
- 1 év szakmai gyakorlat
Tulajdonságok, melyek számunkra fontosak
- önállóság, megbízhatóság, fegyelmezett, precíz munkavégzés
- rendszerszemlélet, kreativitás, problémamegoldó képesség, proaktivitás
- szakmai összefoglaló, lényeglátó képesség
- csapatmunka iránti nyitottság
- ügyfélorientált kommunikációs készség
Előnyként értékeljük
- nagyvállalati környezetben, technológiai rendszerek üzemeltetésében szerzett gyakorlat
- 7x24 órás munkavégzésre való hajlandóság
- hardverek (Desktop/Szerver) ismerete
Amit ajánlunk
- hosszú távú foglalkoztatási biztonság
- támogató munkahelyi légkör
- bruttó munkabér 4%-ának megfelelő összegű önkéntes nyugdíjpénztári támogatás havonta
- bruttó 6.016,- Ft /hó önkéntes egészségpénztári tagdíj-kiegészítés munkabérből való legalább nettó 2.000,- Ft /hó tagdíj levonása esetén
- vasúti utazási igazolvány biztosítása (szabályozás szerinti hozzátartozók részére is)
Munkavégzés helye
Záhony
Munkaidő
Teljes munkaidő
Foglalkoztatás formája
Határozatlan idejű
Jelentkezés határideje
2023-03-19
Vállalati bemutatkozó
A MÁV Szolgáltató Központ Zrt. a MÁV-Volán-csoport egyik leányvállalata, feladatköre sokrétű: szolgáltatási szerződéssel rendelkező megbízói – főleg, de nem kizárólag a MÁV-Volán-csoport vállalatai – számára pénzügyi, számviteli tevékenységet, humán és munkavédelmi szolgáltatást, vasúti oktatást, raktár- és készletgazdálkodást, informatikai szolgáltatást és ügyviteli feladatokat lát el, valamint felelős a beszerzési, környezetvédelmi, szállítási, flottakezelési és leltározási szolgáltatások biztosításáért is. Megrendelői támogatásához hat üzletág biztosítja a szolgáltatásokat.
Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
.NET FEJLESZTŐ, SZAKMAI VEZETŐ 
Mik lesznek a feladataid?
		Új rendszerek fejlesztése
		Alkalmazások kialakítása, kódolása
		Tervezési, fejlesztési feladatok
		Junior, Senior fejlesztők szakmai vezetése és ellenőrzése, támogatása
 Fontos technológiai ismeretek, tapasztalatok:
.NET 7.0
ASP.NET, MVC 5
ASP.NET, Core WebApi
		CSS 3/HTML5/Boostrap
		JavaScript/jQuery
		Visual Studio / Team Foundation Server (TFS)
		MSSQL
		Többrétegű/nagy rendelkezésre állású/elosztott alkalmazások fejlesztése 
		Objektum-orientált szemléletmód 
Vezető fejlesztői szintű tapasztalat
 Előnyként ha van ismereted az alábbi technológiákban:
		Azure/ AWS
		Microsoft SQL Server
		Verziókezelő rendszer ismerete (pl.: GIT)
		WCF, Entity Framework (vagy más ORM) használatában szerzett tapasztalat
		Fullstack fejlesztőként: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular ismeret
 Amit a cég kínál:
		Az alapbéren felül piacképes kompenzációs csomag: cafetéria, év végi teljesítmény alapú bónusz
Angol nyelvi fejlesztő program
Home office lehetőség és rugalmas törzsidő
Munkaeszközeidet te választhatod meg
		Mini konditerem és szauna az iroda tetőterében
		Kerékpár és kutya barát munkahely
Évente orvosi menedzser szűrés vehető igénybe
Fejlődés lehetősége, oktatások
		Önálló, felelősségteljes munkakör
 Munkavégzés helye:
		Budapest 11. kerület vagy remote
 Amennyiben szívesen járulnál hozzá egy fejlesztő csapat szakmai támogatásához, várjuk CV-det a "Jelentkezés" gombra kattintva!

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Portfolio Analytics Solutions Intern 
 As the world’s largest asset manager and a leading provider of financial technology, BlackRock’s purpose is to help more and more people experience financial well-being. Founded in 1988 and based in New York City, BlackRock operates globally, with more than 70 offices spanning 40 countries, and clients in over 100 countries. They opened their Budapest Innovation Hub in 2017, with the idea that technology and finance go hand-in-hand – something they’ve believed since their founding. As a firm and together with their clients, they work to create a more equitable and resilient world, today and for generations to come.
 Feladatok:
 Gain an understanding of analytics, markets, and Aladdin’s capabilities
 Take ownership of the tasks with the guidance the local & global team
 Engineer processes and improve tools to deliver analytics and support BlackRock’s Aladdin technology infrastructure
 Improves operational efficiencies to enable scalable business growth
 Work with technology and analytics groups to build and deliver scalable customized solutions using Aladdin APIs and the Aladdin Compute platform
 Elvárások:
 The position is open for applicants with active or passive student status
 Pursuing a bachelor’s or master's degree related to Computer Science, Software Engineering, Finance or Economics
 Fluency in written and spoken English is essential
 Knowledge of Python programming language
 Knowledge of Office tools (Excel, Outlook, Word, etc.)
 Interest in asset management
  Working time
 Availability to work at least 20 hours per week
 Long-term development opportunity
  What we offer
 2350 Ft/hour in gross
 Internship confirmation
 Potential to work towards a relevant professional qualification
 Join one of the world’s leading asset management firms
 Előnyt jelent:
 Previous experience in Python, Tableau or SQL
  How to apply   If you are interested in this position please fill out the form below and upload your CV.

Portfolio Risk Modelling Intern 
 As the world’s largest asset manager and a leading provider of financial technology, BlackRock’s purpose is to help more and more people experience financial well-being. Founded in 1988 and based in New York City, BlackRock operates globally, with more than 70 offices spanning 40 countries, and clients in over 100 countries. They opened their Budapest Innovation Hub in 2017, with the idea that technology and finance go hand-in-hand – something they’ve believed since their founding. As a firm and together with their clients, they work to create a more equitable and resilient world, today and for generations to come.
 Feladatok:
  Developing a good understanding of factor risk models 
  Working on well-defined tasks to improve the Python research platform 
  Taking ownership of the tasks with the guidance the local & global team    
  Contributing to model research / implementation / testing and documentation 
 Elvárások:
 The position is open for applicants with active or passive student status
 Pursuing a bachelor’s or master's degree related to either finance, economics or STEM disciplines
 Fluency in written and spoken English is essential
 Knowledge of Python programming language
 Knowledge of Office tools (Excel,Outlook,Word,etc.)
 Strong analytical skills
  Working time

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Java Software Engineer 
Your new company
The Air France KLM IT department mainly delivers applications and software for Air France KLM. Its population consists of about 2000 wonderful people from all ages located on different sites around the globe (incl India). We believe our engineers and data experts impact every day our companies financial and operational results, but they are also engaged in how we innovate and realize sustainable development in our industry.  Compared to the market, AFKL IT Development is mature in Agile implementation and a role model to many companies/airlines. We have ambition to grow further in our knowledge and skills and therefore need to safeguard the right balances in the sourcing of our internal and external contracted colleagues. Simultaneously we face the scarcity in talent pools within our Dutch border. KLM has 30.000 employees and is part of the bigger Air France KLM group. The group has a head office in Paris and Amsterdam and has several daughter companies. The AFKL group has over 550 aircraft and we are one of the bigger players in Europe.
Your new role
Specify, design, engineer, test, deliver, deploy, maintain and support digital products in order to optimally enable the improvement of business processes.
Business Platforms take ownership of digitally supporting a related set of business processes by providing a set of matching digital products. The Director of Product and Director of Technology take accountability for the business impact generated by the business platform.
The business platform is organized in product teams which take care of the digital products that are in scope for the business platform. Software Engineers are members of these product teams and bring all necessary skills to the team to enable the team to translate business needs into compelling products and deliver them to end users so that business value is created. Software Engineers take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivering, deploying, maintaining and supporting of digital products. Depending on the service level agreements (SLA) the Software Engineer can be asked to participate in consignation duties, fi. in case 24/7 support is agreed.
The ability to deliver code in one or more programming languages is at the core of the job. As they grow and expand their craftsmanship, Software Engineers are expected to become T-shaped professionals. Each engineer brings deep expertise in one or more crafts and proficiency in other crafts. In the product team, the Software Engineers together secure all the skills, knowledge and experience on analysis, design & architecture, development, quality assurance, DevOps, LCM and operational support as needed.
The Software Engineer hierarchically reports to an Engineering Leader who facilitates and stimulates the personal development and craftsmanship of the Software Engineer.
What you'll need to succeed
• Agile Project Management tool such as Jira or GitLab
• Git and Online versioning tool such as Bitbucket or GitHub
• CI/CD experience
• Spring Boot
• Relational databases such as PostgreSQL and Oracle
Nice to have
• Docker, Kubernetes
• Microsoft Azure
• Redis
What you'll get in return
Bonus, 10% of the yearly gross salary. Payment depends on the individual as well as the company performance
Flexible benefit: detailed above depending on the grades
Discounted flight tickets
Voluntary pension and health
SZÉP card
Nursery, kindergarden
Cultural even ticket
Parking
What you need to do now

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Software Quality Engineer (ASPICE) 
Quality Engineer
Purpose of the job
You will proactively work with the Project and Product Management, Software Development and Software Testing teams to improve product and process quality.
Key responsibilities
Create and maintain quality plans and schedules that support the organisation’s quality goals.
Devise, plan, and conduct process quality checks, project and product quality gates.
Manage and regularly report on project schedule, compliance, deliverables, resources and risks.
Consult and guide designated business groups in their process improvement roadmaps.
Analyse technical requirements and design to implement and verify the corresponding process solutions.
Build, deploy, monitor and continuously improve engineering processes in a cross-functional team environment at an international level.
Facilitate and support internal and external quality assessment/audits.      
Required skills
The successful applicant should satisfy the following requirements:
BSc-level qualifications in Quality/Systems/Software/Electronics Engineering or a similar engineering discipline.
Proven experience of 5 years or more in the Automotive industry, or a closely related field.
Sound knowledge and experience managing, implementing and/or auditing/assessing A-SPICE or ISO26262 (other Automotive industry-relevant standards are a bonus).
Practical experience with writing/deploying work processes.
Practical experience with the full software development life cycle (SDLC). Experience with Agile and V-model is an advantage.
A strong team focus and highly developed communication skills.
Speak/Read/Write fluently in Hungarian and English.
Must have a great passion for doing things right the first time!
What can we give you in return?

Serious, professional challenges
Cutting-edge infrastructure
Flexible working hours

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Functional Safety Engineer 
We are looking for a talented Functional Safety Engineer to join our growing team.
The candidate will report to our TBA (Engineering Manager – Integration & Test OR Software). You will work on the design, development, and integration of our world-class electric vehicle control systems.
As the Functional Safety engineering you will lead all activities relating to Functional Safety activities working closely with cross domain engineering teams, key program and customer stakeholders and certification/regulatory agencies.
You will be involved from a Functional Safety perspective in the Conceptual, Architectural, Design and Test phases of product development. The functional safety work products will be critical for certification for application deployment.
It will be important that you are able to articulate, coach and champion Functional Safety requirements and best practices throughout the organisation.
As the Functional Safety Engineer, you will be a key portal for information internally and externally relating to this subject.
Requirements:
A passionate interest in electric transport/mobility and an interest in developing new generations of electric mobility solutions.
A qualification in Electrical or Computer Systems Engineering.
Implementation of the requirements adhering to functional safety standard ISO 26262
Leading and coordination of creation of functional safety work products according to ISO 26262
Experience using safety analysis (HARA, FTA, HAZOP, FMEA) and tools (PLM).
Experience development of Functional Safety Concepts, Technical Safety Requirements and Technical Safety Concpets with relevant domain engineering teams.
Established safety validation plans with relevant test engineers.
Strong understanding of product development for automotive and ISO 26262, ASIL decomposition, safety mechanism.
Demonstrated execution experience in delivering functional safety projects.
Excellent understanding of the EV vehicle and its main core components
A strong analytical ability and being able to articulate the findings to keystake holders.
Great interpersonal and communication skills with an ability to articulate technical content,
Support of ISO 26262 TUV certification
Other Useful Experience:
Industry experience with IEC61508
Experience working closely with electrical and software engineering teams on safety critical systems with human interaction.
Strong written and oral communication skills.
Ability to mentor, coach and arbitrate with your engineering peers.
Industry experience in robotics, automotive or similar.
Experienced in product development within an A-Spice framework

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Beágyazott Szoftverfejlesztő Mérnök 
Keressük leendő kollégánkat, aki biztonságkritikus projektek beágyazott szoftverének fejlesztésével egy nemzetközi csapat tagjaként segítene nekünk a jó hírünk öregbítésében. Hogy minél hamarabb a csapat felelős és szakértő tagja lehess, mentorálással és képzésekkel támogatunk. Ha készen állsz arra, hogy egy világcég budapesti irodájában, home office lehetőséggel egy remek, segítőkész és elhivatott csapat tagjaként a maximumot nyújtsd, nálunk a helyed. Jelentkezz mielőbb!
Csapatunk tagjaként az alábbi feladatokban számítunk rád:
Nehézgépjárművekre szánt, sorozatgyártott termékeink platform szoftverének széleskörű fejlesztése lesz a te feladatod.
Vevői követelmények értelmezését, belső szoftverkövetelményekké való megfogalmazását, a szoftverarchitektúra és az érintett szoftvermodulok fejlesztését, a szoftver tesztelését, illetve a módosításaid dokumentálását fogod csinálni.
Képzésekkel és mentoring programmal segítünk megtanulni, hogy a feladataid szakértőjévé válhass, mert előbb-utóbb felelős leszel érte.
A projekt vezetőivel és fejlesztőivel való együttműködés szerves része lesz a mindennapjaidnak.
Mindezt csapatban, irodában vagy esetleg otthonról fogod elvégezni.
Te vagy az ideális jelölt, ha:
Ismered a C programnyelvet mikrokontrolleres környezetben. Minden nap használjuk, ez elkerülhetetlen – beágyazott C
Megbízható az angolnyelv-tudásod
Proaktív hozzáállásod – mert a szakmai kihívások nem oldják meg magukat.
Előnyt jelent, ha:
Tapasztalatod van az autóipari fejlesztésben
Ismered az AUTOSAR-t
Használsz verziókövető rendszereket
Jártas vagy az Unit, Integrációs tesztelésben
Ismersz Script nyelveket (Perl, Python)
...a fentiek nincsenek, de érdekelnek, akkor nálunk ezeket is megszerezheted!

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Embedded SW Engineer 
Our teams develop software solutions for automated parking and safety systems, processing various automotive sensor data and providing a robust, scalable output to driving function modules.
YOUR TASK
Our embedded component teams are responsible for various functionality of our perception and fusion stack. These state-of-the-art algorithms are required to run in resource constrained environments. Therefore, you will be responsible for:
> Implementation of a scalable, maintainable, cross-platform capable embedded software solution
> Optimization of neural network post-processing and sensor fusion algorithms for multiple hardware platforms
> Build and deployment of trained neural networks and sensor fusion algorithms into embedded environments
> Software documentation and verification by means of black-box and white-box testing
> Transformation of customer and project requirements into deep learning component designs
> Collaboration with our international agile teams
QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE
> University degree (BSc, MSc, PhD) in a technical area: Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related
> Advanced programming skills in C++
> Basic programming skills in Python
> Good command of English language
> Collaborative, open-minded, team player attitude
NICE TO HAVE
> Work history in the automotive industry
> Experience in CI/CD configuration (Jenkins), and various build systems
> NoSQL database experiences
> Knowledge in Computer Vision, Image Processing or Machine Learning
WHAT WE OFFER
> Competitive compensation and a wide range of benefits, including:
> Bonus system
> Annual flexible benefit (Cafeteria)
> Private health insurance
> Employee discounts
> Sport pass support
> Flexible work-from-home arrangements during and after the COVID-19 pandemic
> Continuous development with access to numerous trainings, including technical skills, soft skills and language skills
> Personal career development and a challenging role with end-to-end responsibility
> Opportunity to see your ideas turn into reality with our test vehicles
> Ability to directly deliver software into real, innovative products
> Easily accessible office location in downtown Budapest (near Kálvin square)

RPA fejlesztő gyakornok 
Az Abesse neve egy latin mondásból származik: „Ab esse ad posse”. Ez a kifejezés magyarul annyit tesz, mint „A valóságból a lehetőségre következtetni.”   2003-ban alakult, a munkatársak és vezetők tulajdonában álló, 120 fős vállalat, stabil üzleti és pénzügyi háttérrel, több mint 50 visszatérő nagyvállalati ügyféllel.  Üzleti problémák támogatására fejlesztenek ki és vezetnek be alkalmazásokat, valamint üzemeltetik azokat hosszú távon. Az üzleti folyamatautomatizáció a legerősebb megkülönböztető jegyük.  Feladatok:
 RPA, workflow és low-code megoldások, alkalmazások kialakítása a cég partnerei számára 
 Egyedi projektekben való részvétel  
 Részvétel a kapcsolódó support tevékenységekben 
 Hibaanalízis és megoldási alternatívák kidolgozása 
 Esetenként üzleti követelményspecifikációk elemzése és az alkalmazás technikai elvárásainak megfogalmazása
 Elvárások:
 Folyamatban lévő egyetemi vagy főiskolai tanulmányok aktív vagy passzív nappali tagozaton
